[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid 
[\[41a.2\]]stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ma nor ba de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chos nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[41a.3\]]chos kyi dbyings [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chos kyi gnas nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chos skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yang dag pa'i mtha' [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong 
[\[41a.4\]]pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[41a.5\]]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 
[\[41a.6\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'ang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'ang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'ang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dgra bcom pa'ang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[41a.7\]]rang sangs rgyas kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sangs rgyas kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_nang dmigs su med pa'i phyir/_nang stong pa nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/phyi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_phyi stong pa nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/phyi nang dmigs su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_phyi nang stong pa nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_stong pa nyid 
[\[41b.2\]]stong pa nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chen po stong pa nyid [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_chen po stong pa nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_don dam pa stong pa nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'dus byas 
[\[41b.3\]]stong pa nyid [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_'dus byas stong pa nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su med pa'i 
[\[41b.4\]]phyir/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_
[\[41b.5\]]dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmigs su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]cing mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[41b.6\]]so/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[41b.7\]]pa stong pa nyid [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]pa'i phyir/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gal te de ltar rtog cing sems 
[\[42a.2\]]pa dang /_de ltar rtog cing sems pa'i tshe/_sems zhum pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing yongs su zhum pa [{]myed [,]med [}]la/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs [{]myi [,]mi [}]sngang skrag par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o/_/
[\[42a.3\]]smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya/_rab 'byor kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzugs ni gzugs kyi 
[\[42a.4\]]rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems 
[\[42a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/'du shes ni 'du shes kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[42a.6\]]yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu rab tu shes so/_/'du byed ni 'du byed kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rnam par shes pa 
[\[42a.7\]]ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rang bzhin dang bral ba 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rna ba ni rna ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 
[\[42b.2\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/sna ni sna'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/lce 
[\[42b.3\]]ni lce'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/lus ni lus kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes 
[\[42b.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/yid ni yid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes 
[\[42b.5\]]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/sgra ni sgra'i rang bzhin dang 
[\[42b.6\]]bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/dri ni dri'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 
[\[42b.7\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_ro ni ro'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]so/_/reg ni reg gi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/chos ni chos kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba 
[\[43a.2\]]ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa ni/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral 
[\[43a.3\]]ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems 
[\[43a.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa ni/_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes 
[\[43a.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 
[\[43a.6\]]rab tu shes so/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni/_
[\[43a.7\]]yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa ni/_
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral 
[\[43b.2\]]ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[43b.3\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[43b.4\]]tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab 
[\[43b.5\]]tu shes so/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i 
[\[43b.6\]]bu/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 
[\[43b.7\]]rab tu shes so/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]rab tu shes so/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang 
[\[44a.2\]]dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[44a.3\]]yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[44a.4\]]pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[44a.5\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[44a.6\]]yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/chu'i khams ni chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]
[\[44a.7\]]khams ni [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes 
[\[44b.2\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[44b.3\]]tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_ma rig pa ni ma rig pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta 
[\[44b.4\]]ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/'du byed ni 'du byed kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes 
[\[44b.5\]]pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub 
[\[44b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/skye mched drug ni skye mched drug gi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[44b.7\]]la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/reg pa ni reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/tshor 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/sred pa ni sred pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang 
[\[45a.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/len pa ni len pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[45a.3\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/srid pa ni srid pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/skye ba ni skye ba'i 
[\[45a.4\]]rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rga shi ni rga shi'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes 
[\[45a.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes 
[\[45a.6\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[45a.7\]]phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[45b.2\]]du rab tu shes so/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 
[\[45b.3\]]shes so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/
[\[45b.4\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi 
[\[45b.5\]]stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang 
[\[45b.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[45b.7\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[46a.2\]]la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid ni/_'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[46a.3\]]yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta 
[\[46a.4\]]ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang 
[\[46a.5\]]dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa 
[\[46a.6\]]blta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/
[\[46a.7\]]rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang 
[\[46b.2\]]bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid ni [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de 
[\[46b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[46b.4\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[46b.5\]]tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa 
[\[46b.6\]]ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag 
[\[46b.7\]]pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni yang dag par spong pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]shes so/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/dbang 
[\[47a.2\]]po lnga ni dbang po'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/stobs lnga ni stobs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[47a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi rang bzhin dang bral pa ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes 
[\[47a.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag gi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[47a.5\]]phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni 'phags pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji 
[\[47a.6\]]lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/bsam gtan bzhi ni bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi 
[\[47a.7\]]ni tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad ni rnam par thar pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang 
[\[47b.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_
[\[47b.3\]]de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni/_rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang 
[\[47b.4\]]mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes 
[\[47b.5\]]pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang 
[\[47b.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[47b.7\]]po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[48a.2\]]pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni so so yang dag par rig pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba 
[\[48a.3\]]bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/byams pa chen po ni byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/snying rje chen po ni snying rje 
[\[48a.4\]]chen po'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ni/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 
[\[48a.5\]]pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 
[\[48a.6\]]'bras bu'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin 
[\[48a.7\]]dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/dgra bcom pa nyid ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 
[\[48b.2\]{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rang byang chub ni rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[48b.3\]]du rab tu shes so/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rnam 
[\[48b.4\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i 
[\[48b.5\]]bu/_de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ni ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi 
[\[48b.6\]]rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ni gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba 
[\[48b.7\]]ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/chos nyid ni chos nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/chos kyi dbyings ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[49a.2\]]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/chos kyi gnas nyid ni chos kyi gnas nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa 
[\[49a.3\]]ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/chos skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid ni chos skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/yang 
[\[49a.4\]]dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de'i phyir byang chub 
[\[49a.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o//_//shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bzhi pa/_/smras pa/_tshe dang 
[\[49a.6\]]ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_'du shes kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_'du byed kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_rna ba'i rang 
[\[49a.7\]]bzhin ni ji lta bu/_sna'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_lce'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_lus kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_yid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_sgra'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_dri'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]ro'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_reg gi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_chos kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_lce'i rnam par 
[\[49b.2\]]shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_sna'i 'dus te 
[\[49b.3\]]reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_rna 
[\[49b.4\]]ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang 
[\[49b.5\]]bzhin ni ji lta bu/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_
[\[49b.6\]]nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_ma rig pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_'du byed kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin 
[\[49b.7\]]ni ji lta bu/_skye mched drug gi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_sred pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_len pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_srid pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_skye ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]bu/_rga shi'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_tshul khrims kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_bzod pa'i pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_brtson 
[\[50a.2\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_bsam gtan gyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_phyi stong pa 
[\[50a.3\]]nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_'dus byas stong pa 
[\[50a.4\]]nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta 
[\[50a.5\]]bu/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 
[\[50a.6\]]kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_
[\[50a.7\]]rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin ni ji 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]lta bu/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_rnam par thar pa rnams kyi rang 
[\[50b.2\]]bzhin ni ji lta bu/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_
[\[50b.3\]]ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni 
[\[50b.4\]]ji lta bu/_byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang 
[\[50b.5\]]bzhin ni ji lta bu/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin 
[\[50b.6\]]ni ji lta bu/_de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_chos nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_chos kyi gnas 
[\[50b.7\]]nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_chos skyon med pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_rab 'byor kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/'du shes kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/'du byed kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rna ba'i rang 
[\[51a.2\]]bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/sna'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/lce'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/lus kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/yid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/sgra'i rang bzhin ni 
[\[51a.3\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dri'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/ro'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/reg gi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/chos kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rna 
[\[51a.4\]]ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/yid kyi rnam par 
[\[51a.5\]]shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang 
[\[51a.6\]]bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg 
[\[51a.7\]]pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[51b.2\]]pa'o/_/rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/ma rig pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/'du byed kyi rang bzhin ni 
[\[51b.3\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/skye mched drug gi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[51b.4\]]pa'o/_/sred pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/len pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/srid pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/skye ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rga shi'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[51b.5\]]phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/
[\[51b.6\]]bsam gtan gyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/phyi 
[\[51b.7\]]nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/'dus byas stong pa 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/_/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos 
[\[52a.2\]]po med pa'o/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos 
[\[52a.3\]]po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/_/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[52a.4\]]kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dbang po rnams kyi 
[\[52a.5\]]rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[52a.6\]]pa'o/_/bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos 
[\[52a.7\]]po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs 
[\[52b.2\]]pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[52b.3\]]ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/
[\[52b.4\]]dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/de bzhin 
[\[52b.5\]]nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/_/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/chos nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[52b.6\]]pa'o/_/chos kyi gnas nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/chos skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/_'di ltar gzugs la 
[\[52b.7\]]gzugs kyi rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_tshor ba la tshor ba'i rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'du shes la 'du shes kyi rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'du byed la 'du byed kyi rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]la 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rna ba la rna ba'i rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_sna la sna'i rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_lce la lce'i rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_lus la lus kyi rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_yid la yid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /_
[\[53a.2\]]gzugs la gzugs kyi rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_sgra la sgra'i rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_dri la dri'i rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_ro la ro'i rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_reg la reg gi rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_chos la chos kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam 
[\[53a.3\]]par shes pa la [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa la sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa la lce'i rnam par 
[\[53a.4\]]shes pa'i rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa la lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa la [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang 
[\[53a.5\]]bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /_lus kyi 
[\[53a.6\]]'dus te reg pa la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_
[\[53a.7\]]rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]kyis tshor ba la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yid kyi 'dus 
[\[53b.2\]]te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_sa'i khams la sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_chu'i khams la chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams la [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyi rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rlung gi khams la rlung gi khams 
[\[53b.3\]]kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /_nam mkha'i khams la nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams la rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_ma rig pa la ma rig pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /_'du byed 
[\[53b.4\]]la 'du byed kyi rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs la [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_skye mched drug la skye mched drug gi rang bzhin med pa dang /_reg pa la reg pa'i rang 
[\[53b.5\]]bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_tshor ba la tshor ba'i rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_sred pa sred pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /_len pa la len pa'i rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_srid pa la srid pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /_skye ba la skye ba'i rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_
[\[53b.6\]]rga shi la rga shi'i rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[53b.7\]]pa la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson 'grus kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la bsam gtan gyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa'i rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa'i rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_phyi stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_
[\[54a.2\]]phyi nang stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_chen po stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid

[\[54a.5\]]bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi rang 
[\[54a.6\]]bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 
[\[54a.7\]]rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang dag par spong ba'i rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_dbang 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]po rnams la dbang po'i rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_stobs rnams la stobs kyi rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la byang chub kyi yan lag gi rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la 'phags pa'i lam gyi rang

[\[55a.1\]]pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid la dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang

[\[55b.1\]]nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/chos la chos kyi mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa la [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa la sna'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan

[\[56a.1\]]kyi mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rlung gi khams la rlung gi khams kyi mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/nam mkha'i khams la nam mkha'i khams kyi mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams la rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi

[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]la don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das

[\[57a.1\]]par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam par thar pa rnams la rnam par thar pa'i mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam par

[\[57a.7\]]rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de bzhin nyid la de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/ma nor ba de bzhin nyid la ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]do/_/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid la gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/chos nyid la chos nyid kyi mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/chos kyi dbyings la chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/chos kyi gnas nyid la chos kyi gnas nyid kyi mtshan

[\[57b.3\]]rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_/rab 'byor kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu

[\[60b.4\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]'byung ba yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bsam gtan rnams bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ste/_de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so/_/tshad med pa rnams tshad med pa rnams kyis stong ste/_de la skye ba yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]'byung

[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste/_de la skye ba yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]'byung ba yang mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong ste/_de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_
[\[61a.2\]]gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/_de la skye ba yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]'byung ba yang mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong ste/_de la skye ba 
[\[61a.3\]]yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mi 'jigs pa rnams mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ste/_de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong 
[\[61a.4\]]ste/_de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byams pa chen po byams pa chen pos stong ste/_de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/snying rje chen po snying rje chen pos stong ste/_de la skye ba yang mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[61a.5\]]'byung ba yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste/_de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu

[\[61a.7\]]'ong ba'i 'bras bu phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ste/_de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dgra bcom pa nyid dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong ste/_de la skye ba yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]'byung ba yang mi dmigs so/_/rang byang chub rang 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]byang chub kyis stong ste/_de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ste/_de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad

[\[61b.4\]]ba yang mi dmigs so/_/chos nyid chos nyid kyis stong ste/_de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so/_/chos kyi dbyings chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ste/_de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so/_/chos kyi gnas nyid

[\[61b.7\]]nye ba yin te/_de ji lta ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang /_ngag yongs su dag pa dang /_sems yongs su dag pa dang /_mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/de ji lta ji ltar lus 
[\[62a\]]

[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha

[\[65a.3\]]mkhas pas rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas rnam par shes pa bdag ces

[\[69b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas sgra ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

[\[69b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas dri bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_lce'i rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das

[\[74a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_lce'i rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu

[\[74a.5\]{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_lce'i rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_lce'i rnam par shes pa 
[\[74a.6\]]ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_lce'i rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la 
[\[74a.7\]]spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_lce'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//_//
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po drug pa/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_lus kyi rnam par shes

[\[74b.3\]]mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan

[\[75a\]]

[\[75a.6\]]bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi 
[\[75a.7\]]bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
