[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]reg pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bde 
[\[79a.2\]]zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma 
[\[79a.3\]]la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[79a.4\]]gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[79a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[79a.6\]]tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[79a.7\]]mkhas pas/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]dben 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_
[\[79b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te 
[\[79b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[79b.4\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[79b.5\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 
[\[79b.6\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[79b.7\]]tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_
[\[80a.2\]{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i 
[\[80a.3\]]rkyen kyis tshor ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rtag 
[\[80a.4\]]ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na 
[\[80a.5\]]mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/
[\[80a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[80a.7\]]gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[80b.2\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab 
[\[80b.3\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[80b.4\]]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[80b.5\]]pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[80b.6\]]pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[80b.7\]]tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]thabs mi mkhas pas/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[81a.2\]]pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs 
[\[81a.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs 
[\[81a.4\]{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 
[\[81a.5\]]rkyen kyis tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma zhi zhes 
[\[81a.6\]]bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la 
[\[81a.7\]]spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[81b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes 
[\[81b.3\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[81b.4\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[81b.5\]]mkhas pas/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_lce'i 
[\[81b.6\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen 
[\[81b.7\]]kyis tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]par spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 
[\[82a.2\]]dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]dben zhes bgyi bar 
[\[82a.3\]]spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan 
[\[82a.4\]]ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod 
[\[82a.5\]]do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom 
[\[82a.6\]]ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom 
[\[82a.7\]]ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te 
[\[82b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub 
[\[82b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub 
[\[82b.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te/_byang chub 
[\[82b.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems 
[\[82b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[82b.7\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[83a.2\]]po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes 
[\[83a.3\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[83a.4\]]phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[83a.5\]]la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[83a.6\]]thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas 
[\[83a.7\]]pas/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_yid kyi 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_sa'i khams rtag ces bgyi 
[\[83b.2\]]bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_sa'i khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom 
[\[83b.3\]]ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_sa'i khams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[83b.4\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_sa'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[83b.5\]]phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_sa'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas 
[\[83b.6\]]pas/_sa'i khams bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_sa'i khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod 
[\[83b.7\]]na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_sa'i khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_sa'i khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub 
[\[84a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_sa'i khams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes 
[\[84a.3\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_chu'i khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[84a.4\]]thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_chu'i khams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_chu'i khams 
[\[84a.5\]]bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_chu'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma 
[\[84a.6\]]la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_chu'i khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal 
[\[84a.7\]]te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_chu'i khams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_chu'i khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[84b.2\]]thabs mi mkhas pas/_chu'i khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_chu'i khams dben zhes bgyi 
[\[84b.3\]]bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_chu'i khams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 
[\[84b.4\]]'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[84b.5\]]po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[84b.6\]]mkhas pas/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar 
[\[84b.7\]]spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[85a.2\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[85a.3\]]thabs mi mkhas pas/_me'i khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_me'i khams dben zhes 
[\[85a.4\]]bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom 
[\[85a.5\]]ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_rlung gi khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[85a.6\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_rlung gi khams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[85a.7\]]la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_rlung gi khams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma 
[\[85b.2\]]la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_rlung gi khams bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub 
[\[85b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[85b.4\]]phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas 
[\[85b.5\]]rlung gi khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams [{]myi [,]mi [}]dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma 
[\[85b.6\]]la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub 
[\[85b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[86a.2\]]thabs mi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_nam mkha'i 
[\[86a.3\]]khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan 
[\[86a.4\]]ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_nam mkha'i khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te 
[\[86a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[86a.6\]]po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_nam mkha'i khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[86a.7\]]tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]pa'i khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag ces 
[\[86b.2\]]bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_rnam par shes pa'i khams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan 
[\[86b.3\]]ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_rnam par shes pa'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[86b.4\]]gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[86b.5\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab 
[\[86b.6\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_rnam par shes pa'i khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[86b.7\]]thabs mi mkhas pas/_rnam par shes pa'i khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas/_rnam par shes 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]pa'i khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i 
[\[87a.2\]]khams [{]myi [,]mi [}]dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bdun pa/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[87a.3\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_ma rig pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[87a.4\]]thabs mi mkhas pas ma rig pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas ma rig pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod 
[\[87a.5\]]na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas ma rig pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang 
[\[87a.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas ma rig pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi 
[\[87a.7\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_ma rig pa bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]thabs mi mkhas pas/_ma rig pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas ma rig pa ma zhi zhes bgyi 
[\[87b.2\]]bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas ma rig pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[87b.3\]]gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas ma rig pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[87b.4\]]po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas 'du byed rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[87b.5\]]thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas 'du byed [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed bde zhes bgyi 
[\[87b.6\]]bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/
[\[87b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas 'du byed bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[88a.2\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[88a.3\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed 
[\[88a.4\]]dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma 
[\[88a.5\]]la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang 
[\[88a.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[88a.7\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas rnam par 
[\[88b.2\]]shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bgyi bar spyod na 
[\[88b.3\]]mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te 
[\[88b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes 
[\[88b.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi 
[\[88b.6\]]mkhas pas rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs rtag ces bgyi 
[\[88b.7\]]bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te 
[\[89a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[89a.3\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[89a.4\]]la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[89a.5\]]mkhas pas [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs ma zhi zhes 
[\[89a.6\]]bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[89a.7\]]gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs [{]myi [,]mi [}]dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched drug rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[89b.2\]]pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched drug mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched 
[\[89b.3\]]drug bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched drug sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma 
[\[89b.4\]]la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched drug bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te 
[\[89b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched drug bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[89b.6\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched drug zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[89b.7\]]pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched drug ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas skye 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]mched drug dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched 
[\[90a.2\]]drug mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas reg pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma 
[\[90a.3\]]la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas reg pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal 
[\[90a.4\]]te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas reg pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes 
[\[90a.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs 
[\[90a.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas reg pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas reg pa bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan 
[\[90a.7\]]ma la spyod do/_bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas reg pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas reg pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[90b.2\]]thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas reg pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan 
[\[90b.3\]]ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[90b.4\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[90b.5\]]tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar 
[\[90b.6\]]spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te 
[\[90b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[91a.2\]]thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na 
[\[91a.3\]]mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang 
[\[91a.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas sred pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[91a.5\]]phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_/thabs mi mkhas pas sred pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas sred pa 
[\[91a.6\]]bde zhes bgyi bar sbyong na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas sred pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/
[\[91a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas sred pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas sred pa bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[91b.2\]]tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas sred pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas sred pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na 
[\[91b.3\]]mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas sred pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub 
[\[91b.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas sred pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[91b.5\]]phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas len pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas len 
[\[91b.6\]]pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas len pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_bcom 
[\[91b.7\]]ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas len pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas len pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 
[\[92a.2\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas len pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[92a.3\]]mkhas pas len pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas len pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na 
[\[92a.4\]]mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas len pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te 
[\[92a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas len pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab 
[\[92a.6\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_srid pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[92a.7\]]mkhas pas srid pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub 
[\[92b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi 
[\[92b.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_srid pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs 
[\[92b.4\]]mi mkhas pas srid pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na 
[\[92b.5\]]mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[92b.6\]]gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[92b.7\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas skye ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas 
[\[93a.2\]]skye ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas skye ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/
[\[93a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas skye ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[93a.4\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas skye ba bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[93a.5\]]tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas skye ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas skye ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma 
[\[93a.6\]]la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas skye ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems 
[\[93a.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi mi rtag ces bgyi bar 
[\[93b.2\]]spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub 
[\[93b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[93b.4\]]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas rga shi bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi bdag med ces bgyi 
[\[93b.5\]]bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te 
[\[93b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[93b.7\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas rga shi mi dben zhes bgyi bar 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma 
[\[94a.2\]]la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang 
[\[94a.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab 
[\[94a.4\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[94a.5\]]thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[94a.6\]]bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/
[\[94a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 
[\[94b.2\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[94b.3\]]mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[94b.4\]]rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/
[\[94b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te 
[\[94b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[94b.7\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[95a.2\]]tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[95a.3\]]tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas 
[\[95a.4\]]pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha 
[\[95a.5\]]rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar 
[\[95a.6\]]spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom 
[\[95a.7\]]ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[95b.2\]]po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[95b.3\]]pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas 
[\[95b.4\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes 
[\[95b.5\]]bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/
[\[95b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub 
[\[95b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[96a.2\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[96a.3\]]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]

[\[96a.5\]]rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar 
[\[96a.6\]]spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/

[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[96b.2\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 
[\[96b.3\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[96b.4\]]tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[96b.5\]]mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan 
[\[96b.6\]]gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi 
[\[96b.7\]]zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bgyi bar

[\[97a.5\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[97a.6\]]phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[97a.7\]]thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi 
[\[97b.2\]]zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la 
[\[97b.3\]]spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[97b.4\]]gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems 
[\[97b.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[97b.6\]]tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas nang stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs 
[\[97b.7\]]mi mkhas pas nang stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar 
[\[98a.2\]]spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas nang stong pa nyid bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom 
[\[98a.3\]]ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[98a.4\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas nang stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[98a.5\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas 
[\[98a.6\]]nang stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas phyi stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar 
[\[98a.7\]]spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas phyi stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas phyi stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[98b.2\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas phyi stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[98b.3\]]tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas phyi stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi 
[\[98b.4\]]mkhas pas phyi stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas phyi stong pa nyid zhi zhes 
[\[98b.5\]]bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas phyi stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom 
[\[98b.6\]]ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas phyi stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[98b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas phyi stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas phyi nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[99a.2\]]thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas phyi nang stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas phyi nang stong pa nyid 
[\[99a.3\]]bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas phyi nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma 
[\[99a.4\]]la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te 
[\[99a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_/thabs mi mkhas pas phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[99a.6\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas phyi nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[99a.7\]]tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas phyi nang stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]phyi nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas phyi nang stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]dben zhes bgyi bar 
[\[99b.2\]]spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom 
[\[99b.3\]]ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems 
[\[99b.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[99b.5\]]tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs 
[\[99b.6\]]mi mkhas pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag 
[\[99b.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan

[\[100a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi

[\[100a.7\]]bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas chen po stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas chen po stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal 
[\[100b.2\]]te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas chen po stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems

[\[100b.6\]]don dam pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid mi rtag 
[\[100b.7\]]ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod 
[\[101a\]]

[\[101b\]]

[\[102b\]]

[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[103b.2\]]stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi
