[\[104a.1\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[104a.2\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi

[\[108a\]]

[\[108a.4\]]bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod

[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]mkhas pas ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[108b.2\]]ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa 
[\[108b.3\]]nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes

[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[113a.2\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems

[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo 
[\[118a.2\]]stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa med pa bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[118a.3\]]mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[118a.4\]]tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab 
[\[118a.5\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[118a.6\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[118a.7\]]gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab 
[\[118b.2\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[118b.3\]]tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas 
[\[118b.4\]]pas mngon par shes pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams 
[\[118b.5\]]bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan 
[\[118b.6\]]ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 
[\[118b.7\]]'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub 
[\[119a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas ting nge 'dzin rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[119a.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas ting nge 'dzin rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[119a.4\]]pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas ting nge 'dzin rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas 
[\[119a.5\]]ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag 
[\[119a.6\]]ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/
[\[119a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas ting nge 'dzin rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas ting nge 'dzin rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 
[\[119b.2\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas ting nge 'dzin rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs 
[\[119b.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas ting nge 'dzin rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas gzungs kyi sgo 
[\[119b.4\]]rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod 
[\[119b.5\]]na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom 
[\[119b.6\]]ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub 
[\[119b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes 
[\[120a.2\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[120a.3\]]tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas 
[\[120a.4\]]gzungs kyi sgo rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dben zhes 
[\[120a.5\]]bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la 
[\[120a.6\]]spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[120a.7\]]gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[120b.2\]]po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[120b.3\]]la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[120b.4\]]mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs 
[\[120b.5\]]pa'i stobs bcu ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dben 
[\[120b.6\]]zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu [{]myi [,]mi [}]dben zhes bgyi bar spyod 
[\[120b.7\]]na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom 
[\[121a.2\]]ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams/_bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub 
[\[121a.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub 
[\[121a.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes 
[\[121a.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[121a.6\]]pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[121a.7\]]'jigs pa rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas mi 'jigs pa rnams dben zhes bgyi 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas mi 'jigs pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod 
[\[121b.2\]]do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[121b.3\]]gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[121b.4\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[121b.5\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab 
[\[121b.6\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[121b.7\]]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[122a.2\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[122a.3\]]thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas so 
[\[122a.4\]]so yang dag par rig pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas snying rje chen po rtag ces 
[\[122a.5\]]bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas snying rje chen po [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/
[\[122a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas snying rje chen po bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems 
[\[122a.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas snying rje chen po sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas snying rje chen po bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[122b.2\]]tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas snying rje chen po bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas snying 
[\[122b.3\]]rje chen po zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas snying rje chen po ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/
[\[122b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas snying rje chen po dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems 
[\[122b.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas snying rje chen po mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 
[\[122b.6\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[122b.7\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]thabs mi mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[123a.2\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[123a.3\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[123a.4\]]pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[123a.5\]]thabs mi mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi 
[\[123a.6\]]mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs 
[\[123a.7\]]mi mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bcu pa/_/bcom ldan 
[\[123b.2\]]'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di snyam du bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_zhes bgyi bar spyod na/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa la spyod pa ste/_byang chub 
[\[123b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[123b.4\]]sgom mo zhes bgyi bar spyod na yang mtshan ma nyid la spyod pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas rig par bgyi'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras 
[\[123b.5\]]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mi mkhas pa ji ltar rig par bya ba yin/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes 
[\[123b.6\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te byin kyis rlob na/_de gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te byin kyis rlob pas/_gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba 
[\[123b.7\]]dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_tshor ba la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de tshor ba la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni 
[\[124a.2\]]skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub 
[\[124a.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'du shes la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de 'du shes la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba 
[\[124a.4\]]dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te 
[\[124a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'du byed la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de 'du byed la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_
[\[124a.6\]]de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/
[\[124a.7\]]gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_rnam par shes pa 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las 
[\[124b.2\]]yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de [{]myig [,]mig [}]la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas 
[\[124b.3\]]mig mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su 
[\[124b.4\]]mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rna ba la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de rna ba la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_rna ba mngon par 'du bya ba 
[\[124b.5\]]la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'grol bar brjod 
[\[124b.6\]]do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sna la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de sna la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_sna mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_
[\[124b.7\]]de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_lce la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de lce la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_lce 
[\[125a.2\]]mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen 
[\[125a.3\]]po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_lus la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de lus la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis 
[\[125a.4\]]rlob pas/_lus mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug 
[\[125a.5\]]bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de yid la mos shing 'du shes te byin 
[\[125a.6\]]gyis rlob pas/_yid mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_
[\[125a.7\]]sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de gzugs la mos 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs 
[\[125b.2\]]su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sgra la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de sgra la mos shing 
[\[125b.3\]]'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_sgra mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_
[\[125b.4\]]sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_dri la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de dri la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis 
[\[125b.5\]]rlob pas/_dri mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen 
[\[125b.6\]]po las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_ro la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de ro la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob 
[\[125b.7\]]pas/_ro mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_reg la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de reg la mos shing 'du shes te 
[\[126a.2\]]byin gyis rlob pas/_reg mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_
[\[126a.3\]]sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de chos la mos shing 
[\[126a.4\]]'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_chos mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las 
[\[126a.5\]]yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du 
[\[126a.6\]]shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre 
[\[126a.7\]]sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni 
[\[126b.2\]]skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol par brjod do/_/
[\[126b.3\]]gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sna'i rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de sna'i rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_
[\[126b.4\]]sna'i rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_
[\[126b.5\]]sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_lce'i rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de lce'i 
[\[126b.6\]]rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_lce'i rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde 
[\[126b.7\]]ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa la mos 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de lus kyi rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_

[\[127a.4\]]mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las 
[\[127a.5\]]yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa la mos 
[\[127a.6\]]shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba dang /_'khrug pa

[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]byin gyis rlob na/_de rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_
[\[127b.2\]]sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[127b.3\]]sna'i 'dus te reg pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de sna'i 'dus te reg pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_
[\[127b.4\]]mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[127b.5\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de lce'i 'dus te reg pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod 
[\[127b.6\]]de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar 
[\[127b.7\]]brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la mos shing 'du shes 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]te byin gyis rlob pas/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde

[\[128a.3\]]la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_

[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[132b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[132b.3\]]pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 
[\[132b.4\]]'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin 
[\[132b.5\]]gyis rlob pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[132b.6\]]'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nang stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de nang stong pa nyid 
[\[132b.7\]]la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_nang stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_phyi stong pa nyid la mos shing 
[\[133a.2\]]'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de phyi stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_phyi stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_
[\[133a.3\]]yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_phyi stong pa nyid la mos 
[\[133a.4\]]shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de phyi stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_phyi stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_

[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chen po stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de chen po stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_chen po stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_

[\[133b.3\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_don dam pa stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de don dam pa stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_don dam pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni 
[\[133b.4\]]skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te 
[\[133b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'dus byas stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_'dus byas stong pa nyid 
[\[133b.6\]]mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su 
[\[133b.7\]]mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid

[\[134a.4\]]dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems 
[\[134a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_
[\[134a.6\]]thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'grol/_

[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]pa stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba dang /_

[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]bar 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po

[\[135a.3\]]'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba dang /_'khrug pa

[\[135a.5\]]gyis rlob na/_de dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_

[\[135a.7\]]tshe/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_

[\[135b.1\]]mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

[\[135b.3\]]ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal 
[\[135b.4\]]chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de dran pa nye bar gzhag 
[\[135b.5\]]pa rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi 
[\[135b.6\]]bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag par 
[\[135b.7\]]spong ba bzhi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de yang dag par spong ba rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_yang dag par spong ba mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems 
[\[136a.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la mos zhing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 
[\[136a.3\]]mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las 
[\[136a.4\]]yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_dbang po lnga la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de dbang po rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis 
[\[136a.5\]]rlob pas/_dbang po mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug 
[\[136a.6\]]bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_stobs lnga la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de stobs rnams la mos shing 'du shes 
[\[136a.7\]]te byin gyis rlob pas/_stobs mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de byang chub 
[\[136b.2\]]kyi yan lag rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_byang chub kyi yan lag mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_
[\[136b.3\]]yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'phags pa'i lam 
[\[136b.4\]]yan lag brgyad pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_
[\[136b.5\]]rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub 
[\[136b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la/_/mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_
[\[136b.7\]]'phags pa'i bden pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]chen po las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bsam gtan bzhi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de bsam gtan 
[\[137a.2\]]rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_bsam gtan mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba dang /_'khrug pa 
[\[137a.3\]]las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis 
[\[137a.4\]]rlob na/_de tshad med pa rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_tshad med pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde 
[\[137a.5\]]ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 
[\[137a.6\]]'jug pa bzhi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_
[\[137a.7\]]na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'grol bar brjod do/_//
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bcu gcig pa/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la mos shing 'du 
[\[137b.2\]]shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de rnam par thar pa rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_rnam par thar pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug 
[\[137b.3\]]bsngal ba dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mthar kyis gnas 
[\[137b.4\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_
[\[137b.5\]]de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[137b.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la 
[\[137b.7\]]mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[138a.2\]]phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mngon par shes pa drug la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de mngon par shes pa rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_mngon par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_
[\[138a.3\]]'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[138a.4\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sha'i mig la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de sha'i mig la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_sha'i mig mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba 
[\[138a.5\]]dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[138a.6\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_lha'i mig la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de lha'i mig la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_lha'i mig mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_
[\[138a.7\]]'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_shes rab kyi mig la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de shes rab kyi mig la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_shes rab kyi mig mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba 
[\[138b.2\]]dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[138b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos kyi mig la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de chos kyi mig la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_chos kyi mig mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_
[\[138b.4\]]rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems 
[\[138b.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sangs rgyas kyi mig la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de sangs rgyas kyi mig la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_sangs rgyas kyi mig mngon par 'du bya ba la 
[\[138b.6\]]spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar 
[\[138b.7\]]brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_ting nge 'dzin rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de ting nge 'dzin rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal 
[\[139a.2\]]chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de gzungs kyi sgo 
[\[139a.3\]]rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_gzungs kyi sgo mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_
[\[139a.4\]]'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 
[\[139a.5\]]la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_
[\[139a.6\]]mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[139a.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de mi 'jigs pa rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_mi 'jigs pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[139b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_so so yang dag par rig pa 
[\[139b.3\]]mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol 
[\[139b.4\]]bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_snying rje chen po la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de snying rje chen po la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_snying rje chen po mngon par 'du bya 
[\[139b.5\]]ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[139b.6\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_sangs rgyas 
[\[139b.7\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yang mngon du bya ba'i skal ba med na/_bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[140a.2\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba lta ci smos te/_de ni gnas med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/_thabs mi mkhas par shes par bya'o/_/
[\[140a.3\]]smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyod na/_thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_nam byang chub sems 
[\[140a.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs la mi spyod de/_gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /_gzugs rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/_gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/_gzugs bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/_
[\[140a.5\]]gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/_gzugs bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/_gzugs bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/_gzugs zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/_gzugs ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/_gzugs stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/_gzugs mi stong 
[\[140a.6\]]zhes bya bar mi spyod/_gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/_gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/_gzugs smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/_gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/_gzugs dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/_gzugs mi 
[\[140a.7\]]dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang /_/tshor ba la mi spyod de/_tshor ba'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /_tshor ba rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/_tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/_tshor ba bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/_tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/_
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]tshor ba bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/_tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/_tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/_tshor ba ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/_tshor ba stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/_tshor ba mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/_tshor ba mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/_
[\[140b.2\]]tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/_tshor ba smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/_tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/_tshor ba dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/_tshor ba mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang /_/'du shes la mi spyod de/_'du shes kyi mtshan ma 
[\[140b.3\]]la mi spyod cing /_'du shes rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/_'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/_'du shes bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/_'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/_'du shes bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/_'du shes bdag med ces bya bar mi 
[\[140b.4\]]spyod/_'du shes zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/_'du shes ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/_'du shes stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/_'du shes mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/_/'du shes mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/_'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar 
[\[140b.5\]]mi spyod/_'du shes smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/_'du shes smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/_'du shes dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/_'du shes mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang /_/'du byed la mi spyod de/_'du byed kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod 
[\[140b.6\]]cing /_'du byed rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/_'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/_'du byed bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/_'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/_'du byed bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/_'du byed bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/_'du byed 
[\[140b.7\]]zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/_'du byed ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/_'du byed stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/_'du byed mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/_'du byed mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/_'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/_'du byed smon 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/_'du byed smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/_/'du byed dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/_'du byed [{]myi [,]mi [}]dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang /_/rnam par shes pa la mi spyod de/_rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod 
[\[141a.2\]]cing /_rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/_rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/_rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/_rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/_rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/_rnam par 
[\[141a.3\]]shes pa bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/_rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/_rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/_rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/_rnam par shes pa mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/_rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces 
[\[141a.4\]]bya bar mi spyod/_rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/_rnam par shes pa smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/_rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/_rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/_rnam par shes pa mi dben zhes 
[\[141a.5\]]bya bar mi spyod pa dang /_mig la mi spyod de/_mig gi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /_mig rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/_mig mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/_mig bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/_mig sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/_mig bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/_
[\[141a.6\]]mig bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/_mig zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/_mig ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/_mig stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/_mig mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/_mig mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/_mig mtshan ma med ces bya bar 
[\[141a.7\]]mi spyod/_mig smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/_mig smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/_mig dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/_mig mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang /_rna ba la mi spyod de/_rna ba'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /_rna ba rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/_
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]rna ba mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/_rna ba bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/_rna ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/_rna ba bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/_rna ba bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/_rna ba zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/_rna ba ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/_rna ba stong zhes bya bar 
[\[141b.2\]]mi spyod/_rna ba mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/_rna ba mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/_rna ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/_rna ba smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/_rna ba smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/_rna ba dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/_rna ba mi 
[\[141b.3\]]dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang /_/sna la mi spyod de/_sna'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /_sna rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/_sna mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/_sna bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/_sna sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/_sna bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/_sna bdag

[\[141b.5\]]spyod/_sna smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/_sna dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/_sna mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang /_/lce la mi spyod de/_lce'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /_lce rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/_lce mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/_lce bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/_
[\[141b.6\]]lce sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/_lce bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/_lce bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/_lce zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/_lce ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/_lce stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/_lce mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/_lce mtshan ma yod ces bya 
[\[141b.7\]]bar mi spyod/_lce mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/_lce smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/_lce smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/_lce dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/_lce mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang /_/lus la mi spyod de/_lus kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]cing /_lus rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/_lus mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/_lus bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/_lus sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/_lus bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/_lus bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/_

[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]zhes bya bar mi spyod/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid smon pa yod
