[\[213b.4\]]mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/_mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/_ting nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu

[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]na byis pa zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba 
[\[214a.2\]]lags sam/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin/_
[\[214a.3\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa lags/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[214a.4\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/_brtson 'grus kyi 
[\[214a.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/_nang stong pa

[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]med pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/_rang gi mtshan nyid

[\[214b.3\]]nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/_yang dag par spong ba rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/_dbang po rnams

[\[214b.5\]]rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/_bsam gtan rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/_tshad med pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/_rnam par thar

[\[214b.7\]]par shes pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/_ting nge 'dzin rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la brtags shing mngon par zhen/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]la brtags shing mngon par zhen/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la brtags shing mngon par zhen/_snying rje chen po la brtags shing mngon par zhen/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la brtags shing mngon par zhen/_
[\[215a.2\]]thams cad shes pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen pas/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems 
[\[215a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab 
[\[215a.4\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam pa gang gis slob par 'gyur ba lags/_ji ltar bslabs na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes 
[\[215a.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs/_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob na/_rnam pa 
[\[215a.6\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing /_
[\[215a.7\]]yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_
[\[215b.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bzod 
[\[215b.3\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa 
[\[215b.4\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su 
[\[215b.5\]]mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub 
[\[215b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_
[\[215b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bcu drug pa/_
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_nang stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[216a.2\]]chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[216a.3\]]phyi stong pa nyid/_de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_
[\[216a.4\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_phyi nang stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang 
[\[216a.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_
[\[216a.6\]]stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs 
[\[216a.7\]]pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_chen po stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[216b.2\]]dpa' chen po/_don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_don dam pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob 
[\[216b.3\]]pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_'dus byas stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes 
[\[216b.4\]]su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[216b.5\]]sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs 
[\[216b.6\]]pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par 
[\[216b.7\]]rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub 
[\[217a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dor ba med 
[\[217a.3\]]pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i 
[\[217a.4\]]tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra 
[\[217a.5\]]dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_chos 
[\[217a.6\]]thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi 
[\[217a.7\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[217b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[217b.3\]]de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs 
[\[217b.4\]]shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_
[\[217b.5\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_/
[\[217b.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod 
[\[217b.7\]]pa'i tshe/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes 
[\[218a.2\]]su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub 
[\[218a.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag par spong ba de dag mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes 
[\[218a.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_rdzu 'phrul 
[\[218a.5\]]gyi rkang pa de dag mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[218a.6\]]pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_dbang po rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_dbang po de dag mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[218a.7\]]sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_stobs rnams la spyod 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]pa'i tshe/_stobs de dag mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams 
[\[218b.2\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_byang chub kyi yan lag de dag mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa 
[\[218b.3\]]ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[218b.4\]]po/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de dag mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi 
[\[218b.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_'phags pa'i 
[\[218b.6\]]bden pa de dag mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[218b.7\]]pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_bsam gtan de dag mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_
[\[219a.2\]]tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_tshad med pa de dag mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa 
[\[219a.3\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes su mi 
[\[219a.4\]]mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[219a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po/_rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam par thar pa de dag mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_
[\[219a.6\]]mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa'i tshe/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug 
[\[219a.7\]]pa dgu po de dag mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa 
[\[219b.2\]]med pa de dag mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[219b.3\]]pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_mngon par shes pa de dag mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems 
[\[219b.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_ting nge 'dzin rnams la 
[\[219b.5\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_ting nge 'dzin de dag mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams 
[\[219b.6\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzungs kyi sgo de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[219b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po de dag mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_
[\[220a.2\]]mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa'i tshe/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi po de dag mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes su mi 
[\[220a.3\]]mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[220a.4\]]sems dpa' chen po/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa'i tshe/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi po de dag mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[220a.5\]]tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_snying rje chen po la spyod pa'i tshe/_snying rje chen po de mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par 
[\[220a.6\]]rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems 
[\[220a.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_thams cad 
[\[220b.2\]]shes pa nyid de mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[220b.3\]]nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid de mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems 
[\[220b.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_rnam pa thams 
[\[220b.5\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de mi dmigs shing /_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs 
[\[220b.6\]]pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i 
[\[220b.7\]]tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_nang stong 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i 
[\[221a.2\]]tshul dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_thog ma 
[\[221a.3\]]dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi 
[\[221a.4\]]dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[221a.5\]]gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar shes par bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_le'u drug go/_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das

[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]pa yang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_mig kyang gzhan la sgyu ma 
[\[226a.2\]]yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rna ba yang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_/gsol pa/_
[\[226a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sna yang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom 
[\[226a.4\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lce yang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam 
[\[226a.5\]]du sems/_lus kyang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_yid kyang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan 
[\[226a.6\]]zhig yin snyam mam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gzugs kyang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_/gsol pa/_bcom

[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_dri yang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_ro yang 
[\[226b.2\]]gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_reg kyang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_/

[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]snyam mam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_/

[\[227b.1\]]yin snyam mam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_/gsol

[\[227b.6\]]lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sa'i khams kyang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das

[\[228a.1\]]snyam du sems/_me'i khams kyang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_

[\[231a.1\]]zhig yin snyam mam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_tshad med pa rnams kyang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_

[\[231a.7\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]du sems/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i

[\[231b.3\]]yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin 
[\[231b.4\]]snyam mam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_snying rje chen po yang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[231b.5\]]'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[231b.6\]]lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub kyang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//_//
[\[231b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bcu bdun pa/_/bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so/_/
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang tshor ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'du shes kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_
[\[232a.2\]]'du shes nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du shes so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'du byed kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_'du byed nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa yang gzhan 
[\[232a.3\]]ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das mig kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_mig nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang mig go/_/
[\[232a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das rna ba yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_rna ba nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das sna yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_sna nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'o/_/bcom 
[\[232a.5\]]ldan 'das lce yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_lce nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'o/_/bcom ldan 'das lus kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_lus nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang lus so/_/bcom 
[\[232a.6\]]ldan 'das yid kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_yid nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang yid do/_/bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs 
[\[232a.7\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das sgra yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_sgra nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang sgra'o/_/bcom ldan 'das dri yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_dri nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang dri'o/_/
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das ro yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_ro nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang ro'o/_/bcom ldan 'das reg kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_reg nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang reg go/_/
[\[232b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das chos kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_chos nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang chos so/_/bcom ldan 'das mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_mig gi rnam 
[\[232b.3\]]par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes 
[\[232b.4\]]pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das sna'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das lce'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/_
[\[232b.5\]]sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid 
[\[232b.6\]]kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/_/bcom 
[\[232b.7\]]ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]yang gzhan ma lags te/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa 
[\[233a.2\]]nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o/_/bcom 
[\[233a.3\]]ldan 'das lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu 
[\[233a.4\]]ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_mig gi 'dus 
[\[233a.5\]]te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 
[\[233a.6\]]rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis 
[\[233a.7\]]tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid 
[\[233b.2\]]kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang 
[\[233b.3\]]yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das sa'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_sa'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang sa'i khams so/_/bcom ldan 'das chu'i khams kyang 
[\[233b.4\]]gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_chu'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang chu'i khams so/_/bcom ldan 'das me'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_me'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang 
[\[233b.5\]]me'i khams so/_/bcom ldan 'das rlung gi khams kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_rlung gi khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang rlung gi khams so/_/bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/_
[\[233b.6\]]sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_rnam par shes pa'i 
[\[233b.7\]]khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so/_/bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_ma rig pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang ma rig pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]'du byed kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_'du byed nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_rnam

[\[234a.3\]]'das skye mched drug_/kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_skye mched drug nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang skye mched drug go/_/bcom ldan 'das reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_reg pa nyid 
[\[234a.4\]]kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang reg pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang tshor ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das sred pa yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang

[\[234a.6\]]gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_srid pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang srid pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das skye ba yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_skye ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang skye ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das rga shi 
[\[234a.7\]]yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_rga shi nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang rga shi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang tshul khrims 
[\[234b.2\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[234b.3\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[234b.4\]]yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang 
[\[234b.5\]]gzhan ma lags te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_nang stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid 
[\[234b.6\]]kyang nang stong pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_phyi stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang 
[\[234b.7\]]gzhan ma lags te/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_chen po stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa 
[\[235a.2\]]nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_
[\[235a.3\]]'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang 'dus ma 
[\[235a.4\]]byas stong pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/_/bcom 
[\[235a.5\]]ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das dor ba 
[\[235a.6\]]med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang 
[\[235a.7\]]gzhan ma lags te/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[235b.2\]]do/_/bcom ldan 'das mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang 
[\[235b.3\]]gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_ngo bo nyid 
[\[235b.4\]]stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang 
[\[235b.5\]]dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/_/bcom 
[\[235b.6\]]ldan 'das yang dag par spong pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so/_/bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/_
[\[235b.7\]]sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/_/bcom ldan 'das dbang po rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_dbang po nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]nyid kyang dbang po rnams so/_/bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_stobs nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang stobs rnams so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag 
[\[236a.2\]]rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma 
[\[236a.3\]]yang gzhan ma lags te/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_
[\[236a.4\]]'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/_/bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_bsam gtan nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang bsam 
[\[236a.5\]]gtan rnams so/_/bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_tshad med pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so/_/bcom ldan 'das gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug 
[\[236a.6\]]pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang 
[\[236a.7\]]gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_rnam par thar pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so/_/bcom ldan 'das mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]ma lags te/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa 
[\[236b.2\]]med pa yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_
[\[236b.3\]]smon pa med pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_mngon par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so/_/bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams 
[\[236b.4\]]kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so/_/bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_gzungs kyi sgo nyid 
[\[236b.5\]]kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang de bzhin 
[\[236b.6\]]gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/_/bcom ldan 'das mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so/_/bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag 
[\[236b.7\]]par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so/_/bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]gzhan ma lags te/_snying rje chen po nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[237a.2\]]ma 'dres pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/_/bcom ldan 'das rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma 
[\[237a.3\]]nyid kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/_/bcom ldan 'das lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong pa'i 'bras 
[\[237a.4\]]bu'o/_/bcom ldan 'das phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa nyid kyang gzhan ma 
[\[237a.5\]]lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_dgra bcom pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rang byang chub kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_rang byang chub nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang rang 
[\[237a.6\]]byang chub bo/_/bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[237a.7\]]pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]la skye ba 'am 'gag pa yod dam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am rnam par byang ba yod dam/_/gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[237b.2\]]ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gang la skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing /_rnam par byang ba med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[237b.3\]]slob par 'gyur ram/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de 
[\[237b.4\]]ji snyam du sems/_nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar 'du shes dang /_brda dang /_gdags pa dang /_tha snyad du bya ba yin nam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/
[\[237b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_'du shes dang /_brda dang /_gdags pa dang /_tha snyad tsam gyis nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po skye ba'am 'gag pa 'am kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/_rnam par byang bar 
[\[237b.6\]]dmigs par 'gyur ram/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gang la 'du shes med cing brda med pa dang /_gdags pa med pa dang /_tha snyad med 
[\[237b.7\]]pa dang /_ming med pa dang /_ming du gdags pa med pa dang /_lus med pa dang /_lus kyi las med pa dang /_ngag med pa dang /_ngag gi las med pa dang /_yid med pa dang /_yid kyi las med pa dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/_
[\[238a.2\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad 
[\[238a.3\]]mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/_sgyu ma'i 
[\[238a.4\]]skyes bus bslabs pa ltar/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bslab par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di lta ste/_phung po lnga po 'di nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par bgyi ba sha stag go/_/bcom ldan 
[\[238a.5\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur 
[\[238a.6\]]ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar phung po lnga po rnams ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/_dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[238a.7\]]pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rmi lam lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar rmi lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/_dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du 
[\[238b.2\]]sems/_sgyu ma lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom 
[\[238b.3\]]ldan 'das de 'di ltar sgyu ma ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/_dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sgra brnyan lta bu'i phung po lnga po de 
[\[238b.4\]]dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar sgra brnyan ni/_dngos 
[\[238b.5\]]po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/_dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_mig yor lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[238b.6\]]la bslabs shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar mig yer ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/_dngos po 
[\[238b.7\]]ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chu zla lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar chu zla ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/_dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma 
[\[239a.2\]]mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_smig rgyu lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_gsol 
[\[239a.3\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar smig rgyu ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/_dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[239a.4\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sprul pa lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du 
[\[239a.5\]]zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar sprul pa ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/_dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni rmi lam lta bu/_tshor ba ni rmi lam lta bu/_
[\[239a.6\]]'du shes ni rmi lam lta bu/_'du byed ni rmi lam lta bu/_rnam par shes pa ni rmi lam lta bu ste/_rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go_/de ni phung po lnga'o/_/de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/phyi stong pa nyid kyi 
[\[239a.7\]]phyir mi dmigs so/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]dmigs so/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/rang bzhin 
[\[239b.2\]]stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs 
[\[239b.3\]]so/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu/_tshor ba ni sgyu ma lta bu/_'du shes ni sgyu ma lta bu/_'du byed ni sgyu ma lta bu/_rnam par shes 
[\[239b.4\]]pa ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/_rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/_/de ni phung po lnga'o/_/de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/stong pa nyid stong 
[\[239b.5\]]pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/mtha' 
[\[239b.6\]]las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 
[\[239b.7\]]phyir mi dmigs so/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/dngos po 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor gzugs ni sgra brnyan lta bu/_tshor ba ni sgra brnyan lta bu/_'du shes ni sgra brnyan lta bu/_'du byed ni sgra brnyan lta bu/_rnam par shes pa ni sgra brnyan lta 
[\[240a.2\]]bu ste/_rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/_/de ni phung po lnga'o/_/de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/stong pa nyid stong 
[\[240a.3\]]pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mtha' 
[\[240a.4\]]las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid 
[\[240a.5\]]kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dngos po 
[\[240a.6\]]med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor gzugs ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]yor lta bu/_tshor ba ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]yor lta bu/_'du shes ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]yor lta bu/_'du byed ni mig yor lta bu/_rnam par shes pa ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]yor lta bu ste/_rnam 
[\[240a.7\]]par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/_/de ni phung po lnga'o/_/de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]so/_/chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 
[\[240b.2\]]kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_
[\[240b.3\]]rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/_
[\[240b.4\]]kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor gzugs ni chu zla lta bu/_tshor ba ni chu zla lta bu/_'du shes ni chu zla lta bu/_'du byed ni chu zla lta bu/_rnam par shes pa ni chu zla lta bu ste/_rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/_/de ni phung po lnga'o/_/
[\[240b.5\]]de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/don dam pa 
[\[240b.6\]]stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi 
[\[240b.7\]]dmigs so/_/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/mi dmigs pa 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor gzugs 
[\[241a.2\]]ni smig rgyu lta bu/_tshor ba ni smig rgyu lta bu/_'du shes ni smig rgyu lta bu/_'du byed ni smig rgyu lta bu/_rnam par shes pa ni smig rgyu lta bu ste/_rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/_/de ni phung po lnga'o/_/de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi 
[\[241a.3\]]dmigs so/_/phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs 
[\[241a.4\]]so/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/'dus byas ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/dor ba med 
[\[241a.5\]]pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs 
[\[241a.6\]]so/_/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/rab 'byor/_gzugs ni sprul pa lta bu/_tshor ba ni 
[\[241a.7\]]sprul pa lta bu/_'du shes ni sprul pa lta bu/_/'du byed ni sprul pa lta bu/_rnam par shes pa ni sprul pa lta bu ste/_rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/_/de ni phung po lnga'o/_/de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/phyi stong 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/'dus byas stong nga nyid kyi phyir 
[\[241b.2\]]mi dmigs so/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/
[\[241b.3\]]rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi 
[\[241b.4\]]dmigs so/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs 
[\[241b.5\]]pas/_bstan pa 'di thos na/_'jigs shing sngang ba dang /_skrag par mi 'gyur lags grang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa yang yin la/_
[\[241b.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs kyang mi mkhas pa zhig ste/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu yang ma 'ongs na/_'jigs shing sngang ba dang /_skrag par yang 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[241b.7\]]pos bstan pa 'di thos na/_mi 'jigs mi sngang /_mi skrag pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /_ldan pa'i sems kyis/_gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_
[\[242a.2\]]tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_'du byed 
[\[242a.3\]]mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab 
[\[242a.4\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_gzugs sdug bsngal 
[\[242a.5\]]zhes bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_'du shes sdug 
[\[242a.6\]]bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_rnam par 
[\[242a.7\]]shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_gzugs bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems 
[\[242b.2\]]kyis/_tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_'du shes bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems 
[\[242b.3\]]kyis/_'du byed bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[242b.4\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 
[\[242b.5\]]sems kyis/_gzugs zhi zhes bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 
[\[242b.6\]]sems kyis/_'du shes zhi zhes bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_'du byed zhi zhes bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 
[\[242b.7\]]sems kyis/_rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_gzugs stong zhes bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[243a.2\]]dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_tshor ba stong zhes bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_'du shes stong zhes bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[243a.3\]]nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_'du byed stong zhes bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di ni byang 
[\[243a.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[243a.5\]]mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_
[\[243a.6\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste/_de mi 
[\[243a.7\]]dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_gzugs smon pa 
[\[243b.2\]]med ces bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_'du 
[\[243b.3\]]shes smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_'du byed smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_
[\[243b.4\]]rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[243b.5\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan 
[\[243b.6\]]pa'i sems kyis/_tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa 
[\[243b.7\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[244a.2\]]chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_gzugs dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_tshor ba 
[\[244a.3\]]dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_'du shes dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_'du byed dben 
[\[244a.4\]]zhes bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/_de mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 
[\[244a.5\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_gzugs mi rtag pa'i 
[\[244a.6\]]rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du shes 
[\[244a.7\]]mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du byed mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]yid la bya bas/_rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan 
[\[244b.2\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_gzugs sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams 
[\[244b.3\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshor ba sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du shes sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de mi dmigs 
[\[244b.4\]]so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa yid la bya bas/_'du byed sdug bsngal pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba'i rnam 
[\[244b.5\]]par rtogs par byed de/_de mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi 
[\[244b.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_gzugs bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba bdag 
[\[244b.7\]]med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du shes bdag med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]yid la bya bas/_'du byed bdag med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_rnam par shes pa bdag med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de mi 
[\[245a.2\]]dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[245a.3\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_gzugs zhi ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshor ba zhi ba'i rnam par rtogs 
[\[245a.4\]]par byed de/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du shes zhi ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du byed zhi ba'i rnam 
[\[245a.5\]]par rtogs par byed de/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_rnam par shes pa zhi ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[245a.6\]]po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya 
[\[245a.7\]]bas/_gzugs stong pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshor ba stong pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du shes stong pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du byed stong pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam 
[\[245b.2\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_rnam par shes pa stong pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[245b.3\]]thabs mkhas pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_gzugs mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtogs 
[\[245b.4\]]par byed de/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshor ba mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du 
[\[245b.5\]]shes mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du byed mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[245b.6\]]dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/_/rab 
[\[245b.7\]]'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_gzugs smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de mi dmigs 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshor ba smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du shes smon 
[\[246a.2\]]pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du byed smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
