[\[246a.3\]]pa'i yid la bya bas/_rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/_/
[\[246a.4\]]rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_
[\[246a.5\]]de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du 
[\[246a.6\]]shes mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de mi dmigs so/_/
[\[246a.7\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_gzugs dben pa'i 
[\[246b.2\]]rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshor ba dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du 
[\[246b.3\]]shes dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du byed dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 
[\[246b.4\]]yid la bya bas/_rnam par shes pa dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o//_//
[\[246b.5\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad pa/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar rtog pa de 'di snyam du sems te/_sems can thams cad la gzugs [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces 
[\[246b.6\]]bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/gzugs zhe zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[246b.7\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/gzugs stong zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/gzugs smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/tshor ba 
[\[247a.2\]]mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de 
[\[247a.3\]]mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/tshor ba mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/tshor pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs 
[\[247a.4\]]pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs 
[\[247a.5\]]pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/'du shes bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul kyis chos bstan to/_/'du shes zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[247a.6\]]chos bstan to/_/'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/'du shes smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/
[\[247a.7\]]'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/'du shes dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/'du byed sdug 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/'du byed bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_'du byed zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/'du byed stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs 
[\[247b.2\]]pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/'du byed smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar 
[\[247b.3\]]de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/'du byed dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar 
[\[247b.4\]]de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar/_de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/rnam par shes pa stong zhes 
[\[247b.5\]]bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/rnam par shes pa 
[\[247b.6\]]mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/_/rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to snyam mo/_/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_sbyin pa'i 
[\[247b.7\]]pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nyan thos 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pas/_gzugs gang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa'i rtsam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas gzugs gang 
[\[248a.2\]]sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/_gzugs gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed 
[\[248a.3\]]do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/_gzugs gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/_gzugs gang stong pa'i 
[\[248a.4\]]rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/_gzugs gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos 
[\[248a.5\]]dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/_gzugs gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/_gzugs gang mngon par 
[\[248a.6\]]'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/_gzugs gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/
[\[248a.7\]]nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/_tshor ba gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pas/_tshor ba gang sdug bsngal 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/_tshor ba gang bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos 
[\[248b.2\]]dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/_tshor ba gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/_tshor ba gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la 
[\[248b.3\]]byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/_tshor ba gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs 
[\[248b.4\]]rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/_tshor ba gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/_tshor ba gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par 
[\[248b.5\]]yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi/_yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/_tshor ba gang dben pa'i/_rnam par yid la byed pa de/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[248b.6\]]yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/_'du shes gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/_
[\[248b.7\]]'du shes gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/_'du shes gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/_'du shes gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi 
[\[249a.2\]]ldan pas/_'du shes gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/_'du shes gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[249a.3\]]gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/_'du shes gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi 
[\[249a.4\]]ldan pas/_'du shes gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/_'du shes gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi 
[\[249a.5\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/_'du byed gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba 
[\[249a.6\]]dang mi ldan pas/_'du byed gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/_'du byed gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi 
[\[249a.7\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/_'du byed gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]ldan pas/_'du byed gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/_'du byed gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i 
[\[249b.2\]]tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/_'du byed gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang 
[\[249b.3\]]mi ldan pas/_'du byed gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/_'du byed gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs 
[\[249b.4\]]pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/_rnam par shes pa gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi 
[\[249b.5\]]ldan pas/_rnam par shes pa gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/_rnam par shes pa gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi 
[\[249b.6\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/_rnam par shes pa gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang 
[\[249b.7\]]mi ldan pas/_rnam par shes pa gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/_rnam par shes pa gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/_rnam par shes pa gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang 
[\[250a.2\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/_rnam par shes pa gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/_rnam par shes 
[\[250a.3\]]pa gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyams pa med pa ste/_de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[250a.4\]]po de mi 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang /_bdag med pa'i 
[\[250a.5\]]rnam pa dang /_zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /_stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang /_dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed pa dang /_bzod pa dang /_mos pa 'di 
[\[250a.6\]]ni rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[250a.7\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]la bya bas/_gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go_/rnam pa thams 
[\[250b.2\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu 
[\[250b.3\]]rtog go_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_gzugs smon pa med 
[\[250b.4\]]ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 
[\[250b.5\]]ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go_/rnam pa 
[\[250b.6\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab 
[\[250b.7\]]tu rtog go_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]tshul gyis rab tu rtog go_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la 
[\[251a.2\]]bya bas/_tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go_/
[\[251a.3\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i 
[\[251a.4\]]tshul gyis rab tu rtog go_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du shes 
[\[251a.5\]]bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du shes zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 
[\[251a.6\]]yid la bya bas/_'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go_/rnam pa thams cad 
[\[251a.7\]]mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du shes smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]tshul gyis rab tu rtog go_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du shes dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du byed mi rtag 
[\[251b.2\]]ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid 
[\[251b.3\]]la bya bas/_'du byed bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du byed zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go_/rnam pa thams cad 
[\[251b.4\]]mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du byed stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu 
[\[251b.5\]]rtog go_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du byed smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du byed mngon par 'du bya 
[\[251b.6\]]ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du byed dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan 
[\[251b.7\]]pa'i yid la bya bas/_rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]rab tu rtog go/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya 
[\[252a.2\]]bas/_rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/_/rnam pa thams cad 
[\[252a.3\]]mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi 
[\[252a.4\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 
[\[252a.5\]]yid la bya bas/_rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/_/de ltar de de dag la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_mi gtong zhing brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems 
[\[252a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes 
[\[252a.7\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba'i 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]chos de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis skabs mi 'byed pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_gzugs 
[\[252b.2\]]sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[252b.3\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_gzugs bdag med tses bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i 
[\[252b.4\]]yid la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 
[\[252b.5\]]yid la bya bas/_gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[252b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang 
[\[252b.7\]]ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 
[\[253a.2\]]'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi 
[\[253a.3\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi 
[\[253a.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba 
[\[253a.5\]]dang /_mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya 
[\[253a.6\]]bas/_gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_/byang chub sems 
[\[253a.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 
[\[253b.2\]]ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_
[\[253b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang 
[\[253b.4\]]rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad 
[\[253b.5\]]mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 
[\[253b.6\]]'byed pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan 
[\[253b.7\]]thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs 
[\[254a.2\]]su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i 
[\[254a.3\]]tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[254a.4\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_mi 
[\[254a.5\]]dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_
[\[254a.6\]]tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[254a.7\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du 
[\[254b.2\]]shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[254b.3\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du shes bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid 
[\[254b.4\]]la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid 
[\[254b.5\]]la bya bas/_'du shes zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[254b.6\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i 
[\[254b.7\]]yid la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]yid la bya bas/_'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 
[\[255a.2\]]'byed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du shes smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_
[\[255a.3\]]nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam 
[\[255a.4\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub 
[\[255a.5\]]kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du shes dben zhes bya 
[\[255a.6\]]bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[255a.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_
[\[255b.2\]]'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[255b.3\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du byed bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i 
[\[255b.4\]]yid la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 
[\[255b.5\]]yid la bya bas/_'du byed zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_byang chub 
[\[255b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du byed stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs 
[\[255b.7\]]rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs 
[\[256a.2\]]su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du byed smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs 
[\[256a.3\]]pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[256a.4\]]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba 
[\[256a.5\]]de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'du byed dben 
[\[256a.6\]]zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab 
[\[256a.7\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_rnam par 
[\[256b.2\]]shis pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[256b.3\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i 
[\[256b.4\]]yid la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid 
[\[256b.5\]]la bya bas/_rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_/byang chub sems 
[\[256b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 
[\[256b.7\]]dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur 
[\[257a.2\]]ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs 
[\[257a.3\]]pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go ma'i 'byed pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[257a.4\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_mi 
[\[257a.5\]]dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_rnam 
[\[257a.6\]]par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[257a.7\]]sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_rnam pa 'di ltar rab tu rtog ste/_gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis/_gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/_gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid 
[\[257b.2\]]kyang gzugs so/_/tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/_tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/_tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o/_/'du shes kyi stong pa nyid kyis/_'du shes stong pa ma yin gyi/_'du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//_
