[\[261a.7\]]po'i stong pa nyid kyis/_dbang po rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/_dbang po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so/_/stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyis/_stobs rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/_stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang stobs 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]rnams so/_/byang chub kyi yan lag gi stong pa nyid kyis/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/_byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 
[\[261b.2\]]stong pa nyid kyis/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa ma yin gyi/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/_'phags 
[\[261b.3\]]pa'i bden pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/_'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/_/bsam gtan gyi stong pa nyid kyis/_bsam gtan rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/_bsam gtan nyid kyang stong pa nyid 
[\[261b.4\]]do/_/stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams so/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i stong pa 
[\[261b.5\]]nyid kyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid kyis/_rnam 
[\[261b.6\]]par thar pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/_rnam par thar pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i stong pa nyid kyis/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong 
[\[261b.7\]]pa ma yin gyi/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i stong pa nyid 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]kyis/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa ma yin gyi/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_stong pa nyid kyang rnam 
[\[262a.2\]]par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/mngon par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/_mngon par shes pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/_mngon par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams 
[\[262a.3\]]so/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/_ting nge 'dzin rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/_/ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so/_/gzungs kyi sgo'i stong pa nyid kyis/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/_
[\[262a.4\]]gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_stong 
[\[262a.5\]]pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_stong pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so/_/so so yang dag par rig pa'i stong pa nyid 
[\[262a.6\]]kyis/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/_so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so/_/snying rje chen po'i stong pa nyid kyis/_snying rje chen po stong pa ma yin gyi/_snying rje chen 
[\[262a.7\]]po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_stong pa nyid 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/_/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[262b.2\]]thabs mkhas pa'o/_/thabs mkhas pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_bstan pa 'di thos na [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya 
[\[262b.3\]]pa/_bam po bcu dgu pa/_/rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/_
[\[262b.4\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs [{]myi [,]mi [}]sngang skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de gang lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la gzugs [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces pa 
[\[262b.5\]]bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[262b.6\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'du shes [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[262b.7\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam par shes pa 
[\[263a.2\]{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa ste/_rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub 
[\[263a.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul 
[\[263a.4\]]gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i 
[\[263a.5\]]tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar 
[\[263a.6\]]de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'du byed sdug 
[\[263a.7\]]bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/
[\[263b.2\]]rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma 
[\[263b.3\]]gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma 
[\[263b.4\]]gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'du shes bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[263b.5\]]nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'du byed bdag med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[263b.6\]]pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad 
[\[263b.7\]]mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la gzugs zhi zhes bya 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 
[\[264a.2\]]tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 
[\[264a.3\]]'du shes zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'du 
[\[264a.4\]]byed zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam par 
[\[264a.5\]]shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang 
[\[264a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la gzugs stong zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_
[\[264a.7\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 
[\[264b.2\]]yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'du byed stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyis sar yongs su sngor 
[\[264b.3\]]mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 
[\[264b.4\]]'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[264b.5\]]nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[264b.6\]]ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[264b.7\]]ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang 
[\[265a.2\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_/gang de la gzugs 
[\[265a.3\]]smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la tshor ba smon 
[\[265a.4\]]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'du shes smon 
[\[265a.5\]]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'du 
[\[265a.6\]]byed smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam 
[\[265a.7\]]par shes pa smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma 
[\[265b.2\]]gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad 
[\[265b.3\]]mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa 
[\[265b.4\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 
[\[265b.5\]]kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i 
[\[265b.6\]]rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang 
[\[265b.7\]]de la gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la tshor ba 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang 
[\[266a.2\]]de la 'du shes dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'du 
[\[266a.3\]]byed dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam par shes pa 
[\[266a.4\]]dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa ste/_rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub 
[\[266a.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la [{]myig [,]mig [}{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_
[\[266a.6\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rna ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[266a.7\]]thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sna mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lce mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams 
[\[266b.2\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lus mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[266b.3\]]pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs 
[\[266b.4\]]par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la mig sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos 
[\[266b.5\]]ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rna ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_
[\[266b.6\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sna sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[266b.7\]]thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lce sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lus sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams 
[\[267a.2\]]cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang 
[\[267a.3\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la [{]myig [,]mig [}]bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces 
[\[267a.4\]]bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rna ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi 
[\[267a.5\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sna bdag med ces bya bar de mi 
[\[267a.6\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lce bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[267a.7\]]gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lus bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_
[\[267b.2\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes 
[\[267b.3\]]gnyen ni/_gang de la [{]myig [,]mig [}]zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/
[\[267b.4\]]gang de la rna ba zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sna zhi 
[\[267b.5\]]zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lce zhi zhes bya bar de 
[\[267b.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lus zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[267b.7\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yid zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[268a.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la [{]myig [,]mig [}]stong zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang 
[\[268a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rna ba stong zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs 
[\[268a.4\]]rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sna stong zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[268a.5\]]sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lce stong zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 
[\[268a.6\]]yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lus stong zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs 
[\[268a.7\]]su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yid stong zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la [{]myig [,]mig [}]mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[268b.2\]]mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rna ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[268b.3\]]nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sna mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma 
[\[268b.4\]]gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lce mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma 
[\[268b.5\]]gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lus mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma 
[\[268b.6\]]gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma 
[\[268b.7\]]gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la [{]myig [,]mig [}]smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rna ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i 
[\[269a.2\]]tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sna smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i 
[\[269a.3\]]tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lce smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[269a.4\]]chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lus smon pa med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i 
[\[269a.5\]]tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs 
[\[269a.6\]]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[269a.7\]]sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la [{]myig [,]mig [}]mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rna ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 
[\[269b.2\]]'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sna mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos 
[\[269b.3\]]kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lce mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan 
[\[269b.4\]]thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lus mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par 
[\[269b.5\]]nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs 
[\[269b.6\]]par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la mig dben zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos 
[\[269b.7\]]ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rna ba dben zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyis sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sna dben zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos 
[\[270a.2\]]ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang la lce dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge 
[\[270a.3\]]ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lus dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge 
[\[270a.4\]]ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i 
[\[270a.5\]]rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_
[\[270a.6\]]gang de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 
[\[270a.7\]]sgra mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la ro [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag 
[\[270b.2\]]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la reg [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces 
[\[270b.3\]]bya bar de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la chos [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces 
[\[270b.4\]]bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang 
[\[270b.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan 
[\[270b.6\]]thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sgra sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos 
[\[270b.7\]]kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dri sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la ro sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan 
[\[271a.2\]]thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la reg sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos 
[\[271a.3\]]kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la chos sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos 
[\[271a.4\]]kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la gzugs bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing 
[\[271a.5\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sgra bdag med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge 
[\[271a.6\]]ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dri bdag med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i 
[\[271a.7\]]rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la ro bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la reg bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams 
[\[271b.2\]]cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la chos bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam 
[\[271b.3\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la gzugs zhi 
[\[271b.4\]]zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sgra zhi zhes bya bar de mi 
[\[271b.5\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dri zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i 
[\[271b.6\]]tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la ro zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[271b.7\]]gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la reg zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la chos zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[272a.2\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[272a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la gzugs stong zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs 
[\[272a.4\]]rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sgra stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 
[\[272a.5\]]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dri stong zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la ro 
[\[272a.6\]]stong zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la reg stong zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs 
[\[272a.7\]]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la chos stong zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes 
[\[272b.2\]]gnyen ni gang de la gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de 
[\[272b.3\]]la sgra mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dri 
[\[272b.4\]]mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la ro 
[\[272b.5\]]mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 
[\[272b.6\]]reg mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 
[\[272b.7\]]chos mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la gzugs smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[273a.2\]]pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sgra smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[273a.3\]]pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dri smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma 
[\[273a.4\]]gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la ro smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs 
[\[273a.5\]]par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la reg smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs 
[\[273a.6\]]par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la chos smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs 
[\[273a.7\]]par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sgra mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de 
[\[273b.2\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dri mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[273b.3\]]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la ro mngon par 'du bya ba 
[\[273b.4\]{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la reg mngon par 'du bya 
[\[273b.5\]]ba [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la chos mngon par 
[\[273b.6\]]'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang 
[\[273b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la gzugs dben zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sgra dben zhes bya bar de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan 
[\[274a.2\]]thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dri dben zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 
[\[274a.3\]]'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la ro dben zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 
[\[274a.4\]]'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la reg dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_
[\[274a.5\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la chos dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs 
[\[274a.6\]]rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[274a.7\]]ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge 
[\[274b.2\]]ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge 
[\[274b.3\]]ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing 
[\[274b.4\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston 
[\[274b.5\]]cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes 
[\[274b.6\]]gnyen ni/_gang de la [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 
[\[274b.7\]]yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan 
[\[275a.2\]]thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs 
[\[275a.3\]]par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[275a.4\]]nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams 
[\[275a.5\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa bdag 
[\[275a.6\]{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 
[\[275a.7\]]bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_gang de la sna'i rnam par 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]shes pa bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lce'i 
[\[275b.2\]]rnam par shes pa bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de 
[\[275b.3\]]la lus kyi rnam par shes pa bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug 
[\[275b.4\]]pa'o/_/gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 
[\[275b.5\]]mi 'jug pa'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po nyi shu pa/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_/gang de la [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 
[\[275b.6\]]rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang 
[\[275b.7\]]de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]pa'o/_/gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 
[\[276a.2\]]yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su 
[\[276a.3\]]sdor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su 
[\[276a.4\]]sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 
[\[276a.5\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad

[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams

[\[276b.3\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam

[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]lce'i rnam par shes pa mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs

[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos 
[\[278a.2\]]ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar 
[\[278a.3\]]de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'

[\[278a.7\]]'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan 
[\[278b.2\]]thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par 
[\[278b.3\]]nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[278b.4\]]dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[278b.5\]]kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas 
[\[278b.6\]]kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs 
[\[278b.7\]]rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa'am/_
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs 
[\[279a.2\]]par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs 
[\[279a.3\]]bar/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs 
[\[279a.4\]]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes 
[\[279a.5\]]bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa 
[\[279a.6\]]sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 
[\[279a.7\]]lce'i 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]ba'o/_/gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su 
[\[279b.2\]]sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[279b.3\]]kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge 
[\[279b.4\]]ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i 
[\[279b.5\]]tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi 
[\[279b.6\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa bdag med 
[\[279b.7\]]ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lus kyi 'dus te 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]reg pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug 
[\[280a.2\]]pa'o/_/gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs 
[\[280a.3\]]su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_
[\[280a.4\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 
[\[280a.5\]]kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams 
[\[280a.6\]]cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams 
[\[280a.7\]]cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[280b.2\]]ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_
[\[280b.3\]]gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug 
[\[280b.4\]]pa'o/_/gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 
[\[280b.5\]]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor 
[\[280b.6\]]mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs 
[\[280b.7\]]so sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 
[\[281a.2\]]'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_
[\[281a.3\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[281a.4\]]chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs 
[\[281a.5\]]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces 
[\[281a.6\]]bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lus kyi 'dus te 
[\[281a.7\]]reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 
[\[281b.2\]]mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 
[\[281b.3\]]kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_chos ston cing /_
[\[281b.4\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i 
[\[281b.5\]]tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya 
[\[281b.6\]]bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lus kyi 
[\[281b.7\]]'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 
[\[282a.2\]]'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs 
[\[282a.3\]]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba 
[\[282a.4\]]med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg 
[\[282a.5\]]pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/
[\[282a.6\]]gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 
[\[282a.7\]]mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 
[\[282b.2\]]'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston 
[\[282b.3\]]cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[282b.4\]]chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i 
[\[282b.5\]]tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi 
[\[282b.6\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben 
[\[282b.7\]]zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 
[\[283a.2\]]'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[283a.3\]]mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 
[\[283a.4\]]kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i 
[\[283a.5\]]rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing 
[\[283a.6\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i 
[\[283a.7\]]tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i 
[\[283b.2\]]bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang 
[\[283b.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_
[\[283b.4\]]nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa
