[\[283b.5\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge 
[\[283b.6\]]ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar 
[\[283b.7\]]de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yid kyi 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[284a.2\]]sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_
[\[284a.3\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs 
[\[284a.4\]]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 
[\[284a.5\]]bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 
[\[284a.6\]]lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 
[\[284a.7\]]yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa 
[\[284b.2\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 
[\[284b.3\]]'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 
[\[284b.4\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang 
[\[284b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_
[\[284b.6\]]nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[284b.7\]]nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos 
[\[285a.2\]]ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[285a.3\]]dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_
[\[285a.4\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_
[\[285a.5\]]nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[285a.6\]]nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams 
[\[285a.7\]]cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya 
[\[285b.2\]]bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub 
[\[285b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams 
[\[285b.4\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_
[\[285b.5\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar 
[\[285b.6\]]de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa 
[\[285b.7\]]las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs 
[\[286a.2\]]par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_
[\[286a.3\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 
[\[286a.4\]]'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su 
[\[286a.5\]]sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 
[\[286a.6\]]'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[286a.7\]]ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos 
[\[286b.2\]]ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa 
[\[286b.3\]]med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor 
[\[286b.4\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 
[\[286b.5\]]kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul 
[\[286b.6\]]gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du 
[\[286b.7\]]bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lce'i 'dus 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang 
[\[287a.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[287a.3\]]mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston 
[\[287a.4\]]cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge 
[\[287a.5\]]ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_
[\[287a.6\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma 
[\[287a.7\]]gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[287b.2\]]chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 
[\[287b.3\]]dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de 
[\[287b.4\]]la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs 
[\[287b.5\]]rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la sa'i khams [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i 
[\[287b.6\]]rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la chu'i khams [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_
[\[287b.7\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rlung gi khams mi rtag ces bya 
[\[288a.2\]]bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la nam mkha'i khams [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[288a.3\]]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam 
[\[288a.4\]]par shes pa'i khams [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 
[\[288a.5\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la sa'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam 
[\[288a.6\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la chu'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 
[\[288a.7\]]kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rlung gi khams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge 
[\[288b.2\]]ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la nam mkha'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[288b.3\]]chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam par shes pa'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de 
[\[288b.4\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[288b.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la sa'i khams bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi 
[\[288b.6\]]sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la chu'i khams bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan 
[\[288b.7\]]thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rlung gi khams bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_
[\[289a.2\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la nam mkha'i khams bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[289a.3\]]thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston 
[\[289a.4\]]cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge 
[\[289a.5\]]ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la sa'i khams zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su 
[\[289a.6\]]sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la chu'i khams zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs 
[\[289a.7\]]su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rlung gi khams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[289b.2\]]sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la nam mkha'i khams zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang 
[\[289b.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam par shes pa'i khams zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos 
[\[289b.4\]]kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la sa'i khams stong zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_
[\[289b.5\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la chu'i khams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_
[\[289b.6\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams stong zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_
[\[289b.7\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rlung gi khams stong zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la nam mkha'i khams stong zhes bya bar 
[\[290a.2\]]de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam par shes pa'i 
[\[290a.3\]]khams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 
[\[290a.4\]]'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la sa'i khams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[290a.5\]]pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la chu'i khams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_
[\[290a.6\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams 
[\[290a.7\]]cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rlung gi khams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la nam mkha'i khams mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos 
[\[290b.2\]]ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam par shes pa'i khams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi 
[\[290b.3\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[290b.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la sa'i khams smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi 
[\[290b.5\]]sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la chu'i khams smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_
[\[290b.6\]]nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma 
[\[290b.7\]]gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rlung gi khams smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la nam mkha'i khams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge 
[\[291a.2\]]ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam par shes pa'i khams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[291a.3\]]gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[291a.4\]]dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la sa'i khams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos 
[\[291a.5\]]kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la chu'i khams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[291a.6\]]ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_
[\[291a.7\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rlung gi khams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la nam mkha'i khams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs 
[\[291b.2\]]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam par shes pa'i khams mngon par/_
[\[291b.3\]]'du bya ba med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/rab 
[\[291b.4\]]'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la sa'i khams dben zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma 
[\[291b.5\]]gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la chu'i khams dben zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[291b.6\]]nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams dben zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams 
[\[291b.7\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rlung gi khams dben zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la nam mkha'i khams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_
[\[292a.2\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam par shes pa'i khams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i 
[\[292a.3\]]tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[292a.4\]]tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po nyi shu gcig pa/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[292a.5\]]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba sdug 
[\[292a.6\]]bsngal zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 
[\[292a.7\]]rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs 
[\[292b.2\]]rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba stong zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang 
[\[292b.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_
[\[292b.4\]]nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[292b.5\]]mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i 
[\[292b.6\]]rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[292b.7\]]gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_
[\[293a.2\]]nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[293a.3\]]nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa 
[\[293a.4\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[293a.5\]]thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[293a.6\]]chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar de 
[\[293a.7\]]mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams 
[\[293b.2\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams 
[\[293b.3\]]cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston 
[\[293b.4\]]cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi 
[\[293b.5\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu 
[\[293b.6\]]phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug 
[\[293b.7\]]pa'o/_/gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i 
[\[294a.2\]]tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag 
[\[294a.3\]]med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 
[\[294a.4\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs 
[\[294a.5\]]su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi 
[\[294a.6\]]sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[294a.7\]]mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol 
[\[294b.2\]]tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang 
[\[294b.3\]]de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 
[\[294b.4\]]mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[294b.5\]]kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs 
[\[294b.6\]]rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan 
[\[294b.7\]]thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la sbyin pa'i pha 
[\[295a.2\]]rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/
[\[295a.3\]]gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 
[\[295a.4\]]yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 
[\[295a.5\]]'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma 
[\[295a.6\]]gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam 
[\[295a.7\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes 
[\[295b.2\]]gnyen ni/_gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs 
[\[295b.3\]]rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs 
[\[295b.4\]]par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[295b.5\]]mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i 
[\[295b.6\]]rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[295b.7\]]chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor 
[\[296a.2\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[296a.3\]]nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_
[\[296a.4\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge 
[\[296a.5\]]ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i 
[\[296a.6\]]tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces 
[\[296a.7\]]bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor 
[\[296b.2\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[296b.3\]]mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_dge ba'i 
[\[296b.4\]]rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i 
[\[296b.5\]]tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya 
[\[296b.6\]]ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 
[\[296b.7\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[297a.2\]]pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[297a.3\]]dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 
[\[297a.4\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su 
[\[297a.5\]]sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs 
[\[297a.6\]]rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan 
[\[297a.7\]]thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa 
[\[297b.2\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la nang stong pa nyid mi 
[\[297b.3\]]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la phyi 
[\[297b.4\]]stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/
[\[297b.5\]]gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 
[\[297b.6\]]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[297b.7\]]kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la chen po stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[298a.2\]]ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams 
[\[298a.3\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams 
[\[298a.4\]]cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[298a.5\]]chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar 
[\[298a.6\]]de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong 
[\[298a.7\]]pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]pa'o/_/gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs 
[\[298b.2\]]su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_
[\[298b.3\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan 
[\[298b.4\]]thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma 
[\[298b.5\]]gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams 
[\[298b.6\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_
[\[298b.7\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i 
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[299a.2\]]dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 
[\[299a.3\]]yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la phyi stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[299a.4\]]sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang 
[\[299a.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_
[\[299a.6\]]nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la chen po stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[299a.7\]]pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i 
[\[299b.2\]]rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[299b.3\]]gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal 
[\[299b.4\]]zhes bya bar de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la thog ma dang tha 
[\[299b.5\]]ma med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[299b.6\]]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs 
[\[299b.7\]]rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[300a.2\]]mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 
[\[300a.3\]]kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing 
[\[300a.4\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i 
[\[300a.5\]]tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya 
[\[300a.6\]]bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo 
[\[300a.7\]]bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug 
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la nang stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam 
[\[300b.2\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la phyi stong pa nyid bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[300b.3\]]thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos 
[\[300b.4\]]ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de mi 
[\[300b.5\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la chen po stong pa nyid bdag 
[\[300b.6\]{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la don 
[\[300b.7\]]dam pa stong pa nyid bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug 
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]pa'o/_/gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang 
[\[301a.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 
[\[301a.3\]]'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma 
[\[301a.4\]]gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams 
[\[301a.5\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_
[\[301a.6\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[301a.7\]]thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul kyis chos ston 
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i 
[\[301b.2\]]tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid bdag med 
[\[301b.3\]]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dngos po 
[\[301b.4\]]med pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/
[\[301b.5\]]gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[301b.6\]]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang 
[\[301b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la phyi stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_
[\[302a.2\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_
[\[302a.3\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[302a.4\]]chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la chen po stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul 
[\[302a.5\]]gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de 
[\[302a.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid zhi zhes 
[\[302a.7\]]bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'dus ma byas 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 
[\[302b.2\]]mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[302b.3\]]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[302b.4\]]sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang 
[\[302b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi 
[\[302b.6\]]sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs 
[\[302b.7\]]par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams 
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge 
[\[303a.2\]]ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[303a.3\]]gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i 
[\[303a.4\]]tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi 
[\[303a.5\]]zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang 
[\[303a.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_
[\[303a.7\]]nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la phyi stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma 
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa 
[\[303b.2\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam 
[\[303b.3\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la chen po stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_
[\[303b.4\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 
[\[303b.5\]]kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[303b.6\]]thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_
[\[303b.7\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes 
[\[304a.2\]]bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 
[\[304a.3\]]stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 
[\[304a.4\]]rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/
[\[304a.5\]]gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs 
[\[304a.6\]]su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_
[\[304a.7\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs 
[\[304b.2\]]par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
