[\[304b.3\]]gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa 
[\[304b.4\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la nang stong pa nyid 
[\[304b.5\]]mtshan ma med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la phyi stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces 
[\[304b.6\]]bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi 
[\[304b.7\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 
[\[305a.2\]]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la chen po stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 
[\[305a.3\]]yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang 
[\[305a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan 
[\[305a.5\]]thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[305a.6\]]ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang 
[\[305a.7\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston 
[\[305b.2\]]cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs 
[\[305b.3\]]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtshan ma 
[\[305b.4\]]med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rang 
[\[305b.5\]]gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[305b.6\]]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs 
[\[305b.7\]]rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams 
[\[306a.2\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[306a.3\]]thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang 
[\[306a.4\]]de la nang stong pa nyid smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug 
[\[306a.5\]]pa'o/_/gang de la phyi stong pa nyid smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la phyi 
[\[306a.6\]]nang stong pa nyid smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/
[\[306a.7\]]gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la chen po stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs 
[\[306b.2\]]rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_
[\[306b.3\]]nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[306b.4\]]nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 
[\[306b.5\]]kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston 
[\[306b.6\]]cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar 
[\[306b.7\]]de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dor ba med 
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 
[\[307a.2\]]yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang 
[\[307a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos 
[\[307a.4\]]kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma 
[\[307a.5\]]gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba/_thams cad kyang /_
[\[307a.6\]]rnam pa thams cad/_mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_
[\[307a.7\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul 
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid smon pa med 
[\[307b.2\]]ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan 
[\[307b.3\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la nang stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma 
[\[307b.4\]]gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la phyi stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam 
[\[307b.5\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge 
[\[307b.6\]]ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs 
[\[307b.7\]]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la chen po stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba 
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/
[\[308a.2\]]gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 
[\[308a.3\]]yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos 
[\[308a.4\]]kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[308a.5\]]ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams 
[\[308a.6\]]cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i 
[\[308a.7\]]tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med 
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rang bzhin 
[\[308b.2\]]stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 
[\[308b.3\]]mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 
[\[308b.4\]]'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad 
[\[308b.5\]]mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge 
[\[308b.6\]]ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya 
[\[308b.7\]]bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la ngo bo nyid stong 
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 
[\[309a.2\]]yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs 
[\[309a.3\]]par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[309a.4\]]gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la phyi stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i 
[\[309a.5\]]tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi 
[\[309a.6\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes 
[\[309a.7\]]bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la chen po stong pa nyid 
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la don 
[\[309b.2\]]dam pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/
[\[309b.3\]]gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 
[\[309b.4\]]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs 
[\[309b.5\]]rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_
[\[309b.6\]]nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad 
[\[309b.7\]]mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_
[\[310a.2\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[310a.3\]]gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar 
[\[310a.4\]]de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 
[\[310a.5\]]dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dngos 
[\[310a.6\]]po med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/
[\[310a.7\]]gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[310b.2\]]kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_
[\[310b.3\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[310b.4\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag 
[\[310b.5\]]pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/
[\[310b.6\]]gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 
[\[310b.7\]]mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs 
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma 
[\[311a.2\]]gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam 
[\[311a.3\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_
[\[311a.4\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[311a.5\]]chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir/_de mi 
[\[311a.6\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yang dag par spong ba 
[\[311a.7\]]rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]yang dag par spong ba rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su 
[\[311b.2\]]sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_
[\[311b.3\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan 
[\[311b.4\]]thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[311b.5\]]nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams 
[\[311b.6\]]cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[311b.7\]]gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams mngon 
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]bar 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 
[\[312a.2\]]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs 
[\[312a.3\]]rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom pa'i phyir/_de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan 
[\[312a.4\]]thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po nyi shu gnyis pa/_/gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 
[\[312a.5\]]rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/
[\[312a.6\]]gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs 
[\[312a.7\]]su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos 
[\[312b.2\]]kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[312b.3\]]ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 
[\[312b.4\]]kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston 
[\[312b.5\]]cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med 
[\[312b.6\]]ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rdzu 'phrul 
[\[312b.7\]]gyi rkang pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir/_de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_
[\[313a.2\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dbang po rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_
[\[313a.3\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dbang po rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 
[\[313a.4\]]'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dbang po rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par 
[\[313a.5\]]nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dbang po rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma 
[\[313a.6\]]gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dbang po rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad 
[\[313a.7\]]mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dbang po rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dbang po rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston 
[\[313b.2\]]cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dbang po rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi 
[\[313b.3\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dbang po rnams dben zhes bya 
[\[313b.4\]]bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la dbang po rnams bsgom 
[\[313b.5\]]pa'i phyir/_de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la stobs rnams 
[\[313b.6\]]mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la stobs rnams 
[\[313b.7\]]sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]stobs rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs 
[\[314a.2\]]su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la stobs rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su 
[\[314a.3\]]sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la stobs rnams stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su 
[\[314a.4\]]sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la stobs rnams mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su 
[\[314a.5\]]sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la stobs rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs

[\[314a.7\]]kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la stobs rnams dben zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la stobs rnams bsgom pa'i phyir/_de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang 
[\[314b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_
[\[314b.3\]]nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad

[\[314b.5\]]thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams/_zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos 
[\[314b.6\]]ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs 
[\[314b.7\]]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtshan ma 
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/

[\[315a.3\]]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs 
[\[315a.4\]]rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dben zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi 
[\[315a.5\]]sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom pa'i phyir/_de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

[\[315b\]]
[\[315b.1\]]tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa

[\[315b.3\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su 
[\[315b.4\]]sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am 
[\[315b.5\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag 
[\[316a.2\]]brgyad pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 
[\[316a.3\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa'i phyir/_de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs 
[\[316a.4\]]su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 
[\[316a.5\]]kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge 
[\[316a.6\]]ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[316a.7\]]chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs 
[\[316b\]]
[\[316b.1\]]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi

[\[316b.3\]]med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'phags pa'i
