[\[316b.5\]]la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su 
[\[316b.6\]]sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[316b.7\]]kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir/_de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi 
[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la bsam gtan rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad 
[\[317a.2\]]mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la bsam gtan rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang 
[\[317a.3\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la bsam gtan rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[317a.4\]]thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la bsam gtan rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i 
[\[317a.5\]]rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la bsam gtan rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_
[\[317a.6\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la bsam gtan rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i 
[\[317a.7\]]tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la bsam gtan rnams smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de 
[\[317b\]]
[\[317b.1\]]mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la bsam gtan rnams 
[\[317b.2\]]mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug 
[\[317b.3\]]pa'o/_/gang de la bsam gtan rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 
[\[317b.4\]]yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la bsam gtan rnams bsgom pa'i phyir/_de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_
[\[317b.5\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la tshad med pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi 
[\[317b.6\]]sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la tshad med pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_
[\[317b.7\]]nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la tshad med pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma 
[\[318a\]]
[\[318a.1\]]gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la tshad med pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 
[\[318a.2\]]kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la tshad med pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 
[\[318a.3\]]kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la tshad med pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[318a.4\]]thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la tshad med pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_
[\[318a.5\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la tshad med pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de mi 
[\[318a.6\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la tshad med pa rnams dben zhes bya 
[\[318a.7\]]bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la tshad med pa rnams 
[\[318b\]]
[\[318b.1\]]bsgom pa'i phyir/_de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la gzugs med pa'i 
[\[318b.2\]]snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang 
[\[318b.3\]]de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 
[\[318b.4\]]yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang 
[\[318b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan 
[\[318b.6\]]thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[318b.7\]]pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams 
[\[319a\]]
[\[319a.1\]]cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[319a.2\]]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mngon par 
[\[319a.3\]]'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[319a.4\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/
[\[319a.5\]]gang de la gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs 
[\[319a.6\]]su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[319a.7\]]sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs 
[\[319b\]]
[\[319b.1\]]rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs 
[\[319b.2\]]rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs 
[\[319b.3\]]rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs 
[\[319b.4\]]rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs 
[\[319b.5\]]rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs 
[\[319b.6\]]rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam par thar ba rnams mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi 
[\[319b.7\]]sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan 
[\[320a\]]
[\[320a.1\]]thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad 
[\[320a.2\]]mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_
[\[320a.3\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sdug bsngal zhes bya 
[\[320a.4\]]bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms 
[\[320a.5\]]par 'jug pa dgu bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/
[\[320a.6\]]gang de la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhe zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[320a.7\]]sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos 
[\[320b\]]
[\[320b.1\]]kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[320b.2\]]pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 
[\[320b.3\]]kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[320b.4\]]gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 
[\[320b.5\]]dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la mthar 
[\[320b.6\]]kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom pa'i phyir/_de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs 
[\[320b.7\]]su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs 
[\[321a\]]
[\[321a.1\]]par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i 
[\[321a.2\]]tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[321a.3\]]mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bdag med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su 
[\[321a.4\]]sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_
[\[321a.5\]]nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[321a.6\]]thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[321a.7\]]ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa 
[\[321b\]]
[\[321b.1\]]nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug 
[\[321b.2\]]pa'o/_/gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par 
[\[321b.3\]]nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dben zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams 
[\[321b.4\]]cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bsgom pa'i phyir/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[321b.5\]]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos 
[\[321b.6\]]ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul 
[\[321b.7\]]gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul 
[\[322a\]]
[\[322a.1\]]gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[322a.2\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de 
[\[322a.3\]]mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams mtshan ma med 
[\[322a.4\]]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams 
[\[322a.5\]]smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_gang de la mngon par shes pa 
[\[322a.6\]]rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang 
[\[322a.7\]]de la mngon par shes pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o//_
[\[322b\]]
[\[322b.1\]]gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[322b.2\]]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 
[\[322b.3\]]mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 
[\[322b.4\]]yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang 
[\[322b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_
[\[322b.6\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_
[\[322b.7\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan 
[\[323a\]]
[\[323a.1\]]thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams 
[\[323a.2\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang 
[\[323a.3\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams dben zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 
[\[323a.4\]]kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom pa'i phyir/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams 
[\[323a.5\]]cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[323a.6\]]thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_
[\[323a.7\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos 
[\[323b\]]
[\[323b.1\]]ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston 
[\[323b.2\]]cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos 
[\[323b.3\]]ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul 
[\[323b.4\]]gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[323b.5\]]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]ces 
[\[323b.6\]]bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams dben zhes 
[\[323b.7\]]bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom 
[\[324a\]]
[\[324a.1\]]pa'i phyir/_de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor 
[\[324a.2\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams 
[\[324a.3\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i 
[\[324a.4\]]rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[324a.5\]]chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[324a.6\]]ba'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong zhes bya bar 
[\[324a.7\]]de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 
[\[324b\]]
[\[324b.1\]]mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la de bzhin gshegs 
[\[324b.2\]]pa'i stobs bcu smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang 
[\[324b.3\]]de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs 
[\[324b.4\]]su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs 
[\[324b.5\]]rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom pa'i phyir/_de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan 
[\[324b.6\]]thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs 
[\[324b.7\]]par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la mi 'jigs pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma 
[\[325a\]]
[\[325a.1\]]gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang 
[\[325a.2\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la mi 'jigs pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang 
[\[325a.3\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la mi 'jigs pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang 
[\[325a.4\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[325a.5\]]thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_
[\[325a.6\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[325a.7\]]chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[325b\]]
[\[325b.1\]]gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir/_de mi dmigs pa'i 
[\[325b.2\]]tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de mi 
[\[325b.3\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug 
[\[325b.4\]]bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la so so yang dag 
[\[325b.5\]]par rig pa rnams bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de 
[\[325b.6\]]la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang 
[\[325b.7\]]de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[326a\]]
[\[326a.1\]]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 
[\[326a.2\]]'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma 
[\[326a.3\]]gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[326a.4\]]thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul 
[\[326a.5\]]gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom pa'i 
[\[326a.6\]]phyir/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la snying 
[\[326a.7\]]rje chen po [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o 
[\[326b\]]
[\[326b.1\]]gang de la snying rje chen po sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug 
[\[326b.2\]]pa'o/_/gang de la snying rje chen po bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs 
[\[326b.3\]]su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la snying rje chen po zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 
[\[326b.4\]]yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la snying rje chen po stong zhes bya bar de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs 
[\[326b.5\]]su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la snying rje chen po mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 
[\[326b.6\]]yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la snying rje chen po smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[326b.7\]]kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la snying rje chen po mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 
[\[327a\]]
[\[327a.1\]]'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la snying rje chen po dben zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs 
[\[327a.2\]]par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la snying rje chen po bsgom pa'i phyir/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma 
[\[327a.3\]]gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa 
[\[327a.4\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams/_sdug bsngal zhes bya bar do [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_
[\[327a.5\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams/_bdag med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_
[\[327a.6\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i 
[\[327a.7\]]rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge 
[\[327b\]]
[\[327b.1\]]ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i 
[\[327b.2\]]tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams smon pa med ces 
[\[327b.3\]]bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 
[\[327b.4\]]pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug 
[\[327b.5\]]pa'o/_/gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[327b.6\]]kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/_/gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi 
[\[327b.7\]]sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa'i phyir/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs 
[\[328a\]]
[\[328a.1\]]par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/gang de la byang chub bsgom pa'i phyir/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[328a.2\]]ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po nyi shu gsum pa/_/rab 'byor 'di ni byang 
[\[328a.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du shes par bya ste/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen des yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos na/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[328a.4\]]sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/_'jigs 
[\[328a.5\]]shing sdang la skrag par 'gyur zhing thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas te sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu ltung zhing /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su spangs pa lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[328a.6\]]chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang /_/
[\[328a.7\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang /_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la 
[\[328b\]]
[\[328b.1\]]bya ba med par/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang /_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[328b.2\]]sgom zhing [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang /_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[328b.3\]]des rlom sems su byed pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa de lta bu ni/_rab 'byor byang chub 
[\[328b.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams 
[\[328b.5\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[328b.6\]]la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab 
[\[328b.7\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom 
[\[329a\]]
[\[329a.1\]]sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_gzugs stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul 
[\[329a.2\]]gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_gzugs chen po stong pa zhes bya 
[\[329a.3\]]bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyi sa chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med 
[\[329a.4\]]par/_gzugs don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[329a.5\]]nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_gzugs 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[329a.6\]]pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_gzugs 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/
[\[329a.7\]]de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_gzugs mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang 
[\[329b\]]
[\[329b.1\]]dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_gzugs thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_
[\[329b.2\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_
[\[329b.3\]]gzugs dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[329b.4\]]mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_gzugs rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[329b.5\]]phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_gzugs chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid 
[\[329b.6\]]kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_gzugs rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[329b.7\]]rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_gzugs [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong 
[\[330a\]]
[\[330a.1\]]pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[330a.2\]]pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_gzugs dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[330a.3\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_gzugs ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/
[\[330a.4\]]de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[330a.5\]]kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la 
[\[330a.6\]]bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[330a.7\]]mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[330b\]]
[\[330b.1\]]tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes 
[\[330b.2\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa 
[\[330b.3\]]nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong 
[\[330b.4\]]pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_
[\[330b.5\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_tshor ba 
[\[330b.6\]]'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[330b.7\]]pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha 
[\[331a\]]
[\[331a.1\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa 
[\[331a.2\]]nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar

[\[331a.5\]]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su

[\[331b\]]
[\[331b.1\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par 
[\[331b.2\]]tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

[\[332a\]]
[\[332a.1\]]la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_'du shes phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang

[\[332a.7\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_'du shes 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab

[\[332b.1\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_'du shes 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid

[\[333a\]]
[\[333a.1\]]chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_'du

[\[333b.1\]]tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_'du byed nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed

[\[335a\]]
[\[335a.1\]]nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_'du byed dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang 
[\[335a.2\]]rlom sems su byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya 
[\[335a.3\]]bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_

[\[339a.1\]]nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_rna ba thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_

[\[339b\]]
[\[339b.1\]]byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_

[\[342b.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_lce [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa
