[\[343b\]]
[\[343b.1\]]gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_lus mtha' las 'das pa 
[\[343b.2\]]stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[343b.3\]]dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_lus thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes 
[\[343b.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_lus dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa 
[\[343b.5\]]nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_lus rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang 
[\[343b.6\]]bzhin stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_lus chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya 
[\[343b.7\]]bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba 
[\[344a\]]
[\[344a.1\]]med par/_lus rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[344a.2\]]pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_lus mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems 
[\[344a.3\]]su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_lus dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong 
[\[344a.4\]]pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_lus ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_
[\[344a.5\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_lus dngos po 
[\[344a.6\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong 
[\[344a.7\]]phrag brgya pa/_bam po nyi shu bzhi pa/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la 
[\[344b\]]
[\[344b.1\]]bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_yid nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams 
[\[344b.2\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_yid phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[344b.3\]]pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_yid phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de 
[\[344b.4\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_yid stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid 
[\[344b.5\]]kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_yid chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid 
[\[344b.6\]]kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_yid don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed 
[\[344b.7\]]de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_yid 'dus 
[\[345a\]]
[\[345a.1\]]byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[345a.2\]]mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_yid 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[345a.3\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_yid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom 
[\[345a.4\]]sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_yid thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma 
[\[345a.5\]]dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_yid dor ba med pa stong pa zhes 
[\[345a.6\]]bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la 
[\[345a.7\]]bya ba med par/_yid rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i tshe/_rnam pa 
[\[345b\]]
[\[345b.1\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_yid chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/
[\[345b.2\]]de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_yid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs 
[\[345b.3\]]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_yid mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs 
[\[345b.4\]]pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_yid dngos po med 
[\[345b.5\]]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 
[\[345b.6\]]ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_yid ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[345b.7\]]tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_yid dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis 
[\[346a\]]
[\[346a.1\]]kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_gzugs 
[\[346a.2\]]nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid 
[\[346a.3\]]la bya ba med par/_gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[346a.4\]]pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[346a.5\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_gzugs stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su 
[\[346a.6\]]byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_
[\[346a.7\]]stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_gzugs don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[346b\]]
[\[346b.1\]]gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_gzugs 'dus byas stong pa 
[\[346b.2\]]zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba 
[\[346b.3\]]med par/_gzugs 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[346b.4\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_gzugs mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom 
[\[346b.5\]]sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_gzugs thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang 
[\[346b.6\]]tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_gzugs dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya 
[\[346b.7\]]bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 
[\[347a\]]
[\[347a.1\]]yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_gzugs rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[347a.2\]]la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_gzugs chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su 
[\[347a.3\]]byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_gzugs rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[347a.4\]]kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_gzugs [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_
[\[347a.5\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_gzugs 
[\[347a.6\]]dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[347a.7\]]pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_gzugs ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[347b\]]
[\[347b.1\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa 
[\[347b.2\]]nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_sgra nang stong pa 
[\[347b.3\]]zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba 
[\[347b.4\]]med par/_sgra phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan 
[\[347b.5\]]pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_sgra phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam 
[\[347b.6\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_sgra stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab 
[\[347b.7\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_sgra chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom 
[\[348a\]]
[\[348a.1\]]sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_sgra don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[348a.2\]]don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_sgra 'dus byas stong pa zhes 
[\[348a.3\]]bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 
[\[348a.4\]]yid la bya ba med par/_sgra 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[348a.5\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_sgra mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang 
[\[348a.6\]]rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_sgra thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma 
[\[348a.7\]]dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_sgra dor ba med pa stong pa zhes 
[\[348b\]]
[\[348b.1\]]bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[348b.2\]]par/_sgra rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[348b.3\]]mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_sgra chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes 
[\[348b.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_sgra rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs 
[\[348b.5\]]la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_sgra mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs 
[\[348b.6\]]pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_sgra 
[\[348b.7\]]dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[349a\]]
[\[349a.1\]]mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_sgra ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha 
[\[349a.2\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_sgra dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la 
[\[349a.3\]]stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_dri nang stong pa 
[\[349a.4\]]zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba 
[\[349a.5\]]med par/_dri phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[349a.6\]]dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_dri phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[349a.7\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_dri stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[349b\]]
[\[349b.1\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_dri chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[349b.2\]]la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_dri don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/
[\[349b.3\]]de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_dri 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa 
[\[349b.4\]]nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_dri 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[349b.5\]]'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_dri mtha' las 'das pa 
[\[349b.6\]]stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[349b.7\]]mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_dri thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de 
[\[350a\]]
[\[350a.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_dri dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang 
[\[350a.2\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_dri rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul 
[\[350a.3\]]gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_dri chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya 
[\[350a.4\]]bar yid la byed do/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 
[\[350a.5\]]yid la bya ba med par/_dri rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[350a.6\]]pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_dri [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_/[{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed 
[\[350a.7\]]do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_dri dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_
[\[350b\]]
[\[350b.1\]]stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_dri ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo 
[\[350b.2\]]nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_dri dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid 
[\[350b.3\]]la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[350b.4\]]pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_ro nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi 
[\[350b.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_ro phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed 
[\[350b.6\]]do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_ro phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa 
[\[350b.7\]]nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_ro stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa 
[\[351a\]]
[\[351a.1\]]nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_ro chen po stong pa 
[\[351a.2\]]zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la 
[\[351a.3\]]bya ba med par/_ro don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams 
[\[351a.4\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_ro 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha 
[\[351a.5\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_ro 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong 
[\[351a.6\]]pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_ro mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[351a.7\]]pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_ro thog ma 
[\[351b\]]
[\[351b.1\]]dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams 
[\[351b.2\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_ro dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[351b.3\]]phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_ro rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/
[\[351b.4\]]de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_ro chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa 
[\[351b.5\]]nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_ro rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis rang gi

[\[352a\]]
[\[352a.1\]]ro dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam 
[\[352a.2\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_ro ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[352a.3\]]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_ro dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa 
[\[352a.4\]]nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_reg nang stong

[\[352b\]]
[\[352b.1\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_reg stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi 
[\[352b.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_reg chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom 
[\[352b.3\]]sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_reg don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang 
[\[352b.4\]]dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_reg 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs 
[\[352b.5\]]pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_reg 'dus 
[\[352b.6\]]ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[352b.7\]]mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_reg mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de 
[\[353a\]]
[\[353a.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_reg thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med 
[\[353a.2\]]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_reg dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed 
[\[353a.3\]]de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_
[\[353a.4\]]reg rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 
[\[353a.5\]]ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_reg chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[353a.6\]]la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_reg rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom 
[\[353a.7\]]sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_reg [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa 
[\[353b\]]
[\[353b.1\]]nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_reg dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed 
[\[353b.2\]]de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_reg 
[\[353b.3\]]ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 
[\[353b.4\]]ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_reg dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan 
[\[353b.5\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_chos nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa 
[\[353b.6\]]nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_chos phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[353b.7\]]pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_chos phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid 
[\[354a\]]
[\[354a.1\]]la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med 
[\[354a.2\]]par/_chos stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[354a.3\]]mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_chos chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[354a.4\]]phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_chos don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su 
[\[354a.5\]]byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_chos 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la 
[\[354a.6\]]stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_chos 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[354a.7\]]gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_chos mtha' las 'das pa 
[\[354b\]]
[\[354b.1\]]stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 
[\[354b.2\]]yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_chos thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[354b.3\]]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_chos dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom 
[\[354b.4\]]sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_chos rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 
[\[354b.5\]]dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_chos chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_
[\[354b.6\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_chos 
[\[354b.7\]]rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[355a\]]
[\[355a.1\]]pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_chos mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes 
[\[355a.2\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_chos dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_/stong pa nyid 
[\[355a.3\]]kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_chos ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong 
[\[355a.4\]]pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_chos dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 
[\[355a.5\]]yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[355a.6\]]phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_mig gi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom 
[\[355a.7\]]sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_mig gi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa 
[\[355b\]]
[\[355b.1\]]nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid

[\[355b.3\]]par/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[355b.4\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis 
[\[355b.5\]]kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_

[\[355b.7\]{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa/_'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_/rnam pa 
[\[356a\]]
[\[356a.1\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang 
[\[356a.2\]]rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis

[\[356a.4\]]tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[356a.5\]]mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi 
[\[356a.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul kyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid 
[\[356a.7\]]kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa/_chos thams cad stong pa/_zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_
[\[356b\]]
[\[356b.1\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_

[\[356b.3\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su

[\[356b.5\]]nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_mig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la 
[\[356b.6\]]byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]
[\[356b.7\]]gi rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub 
[\[357a\]]
[\[357a.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_
[\[357a.2\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa phyi 
[\[357a.3\]]stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya 
[\[357a.4\]]ba med par/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa 
[\[357a.5\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/
[\[357a.6\]]de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs 
[\[357a.7\]]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_
[\[357b\]]
[\[357b.1\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_rna ba'i rnam par shes 
[\[357b.2\]]pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[357b.3\]]dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi 
[\[357b.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 
[\[357b.5\]]kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma med 
[\[357b.6\]]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[357b.7\]]pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha 
[\[358a\]]
[\[358a.1\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 
[\[358a.2\]]dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid 
[\[358a.3\]]la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_

[\[358b\]]
[\[358b.1\]]la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_rna ba'i rnam

[\[360a\]]

[\[362a\]]
[\[362a.1\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang 
[\[362a.2\]]rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa 
[\[362a.3\]]nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid

[\[362b\]]
[\[362b.1\]]stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]

[\[362b.3\]]par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam

[\[363a\]]
[\[363a.1\]]ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha

[\[366a\]]
[\[366a.1\]]tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med

[\[366b\]]

[\[370a.1\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]

[\[370a.5\]]sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang

[\[370b\]]
[\[370b.1\]]yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i

[\[370b.3\]]sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'dus

[\[371a\]]
[\[371a.1\]]pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_lce'i 'dus

[\[371b\]]
[\[371b.1\]]byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]

[\[374a\]]

[\[374b\]]
[\[374b.1\]]stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_

[\[374b.4\]]pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid 
[\[374b.5\]]kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[374b.6\]]pa'i tshul gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_yid kyi 
[\[374b.7\]]'dus te reg pa dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa 
[\[375a\]]
[\[375a.1\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang 
[\[375a.2\]]rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_
[\[375a.3\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[375a.4\]]pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid 
[\[375a.5\]]kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_
[\[375a.6\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 
[\[375a.7\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[375b\]]
[\[375b.1\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa 
[\[375b.2\]]nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid 
[\[375b.3\]]la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba 
[\[375b.4\]]med par/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi 
[\[375b.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa 
[\[375b.6\]]nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'dus 
[\[375b.7\]]ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[376a\]]
[\[376a.1\]]nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa 
[\[376a.2\]]nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar 
[\[376a.3\]]yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan 
[\[376a.4\]]pa'i yid la bya ba med par/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes 
[\[376a.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 
[\[376a.6\]]dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba/_chos thams cad 
[\[376a.7\]]stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 
[\[376b\]]
[\[376b.1\]]yid la bya ba med par/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_/[{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de

[\[376b.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i 
[\[376b.4\]]rkyen kyis tshor ba dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam 
[\[376b.5\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang

[\[377a\]]
[\[377a.1\]]tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_

[\[377a.3\]]la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_rna

[\[377b\]]
[\[377b.1\]]rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

[\[377b.4\]]bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 
[\[377b.5\]]yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su 
[\[377b.6\]]byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i 
[\[377b.7\]]tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_rna ba'i 
[\[378a\]]
[\[378a.1\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[378a.2\]]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs 
[\[378a.3\]]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba chos thams cad stong 
[\[378a.4\]]pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan 
[\[378a.5\]]pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/
[\[378a.6\]]de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]

[\[378b\]]
[\[378b.1\]]kyis tshor ba dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_

[\[378b.3\]]kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa 
[\[378b.4\]]zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_
[\[378b.5\]]de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid
