[\[379a\]]
[\[379a.1\]]par/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba/_phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi 
[\[379a.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 
[\[379a.3\]]dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba chen po stong pa 
[\[379a.4\]]zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid 
[\[379a.5\]]la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[379a.6\]]tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang 
[\[379a.7\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'dus ma byas 
[\[379b\]]
[\[379b.1\]]stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan 
[\[379b.2\]]pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom 
[\[379b.3\]]sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_
[\[379b.4\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_
[\[379b.5\]]sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[379b.6\]]pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_
[\[379b.7\]]stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa 
[\[380a\]]
[\[380a.1\]]zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa 
[\[380a.2\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid 
[\[380a.3\]]kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid 
[\[380a.4\]]la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa'i stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la 
[\[380a.5\]]bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de 
[\[380a.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo 
[\[380a.7\]]nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis 
[\[380b\]]
[\[380b.1\]]tshor ba dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub 
[\[380b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_
[\[380b.3\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_lce'i 
[\[380b.4\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam 
[\[380b.5\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba/_phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang 
[\[380b.6\]]rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byad de/_
[\[380b.7\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_lce'i 
[\[381a\]]
[\[381a.1\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[381a.2\]]pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa 
[\[381a.3\]]nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la 
[\[381a.4\]]byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[381a.5\]]par/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[381a.6\]]phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 
[\[381a.7\]]kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma 
[\[381b\]]
[\[381b.1\]]med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[381b.2\]]pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed 
[\[381b.3\]]do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[381b.4\]]rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor 
[\[381b.5\]]ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[381b.6\]]mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom 
[\[381b.7\]]sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[382a\]]
[\[382a.1\]]pa'i tshul gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[382a.2\]]par/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes 
[\[382a.3\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[382a.4\]]kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dngos po 
[\[382a.5\]]med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[382a.6\]]dpa' chen po/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[382a.7\]]pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_lus kyi 'dus 
[\[382b\]]
[\[382b.1\]]te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[382b.2\]]pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de/_/
[\[382b.3\]]de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[382b.4\]]stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen 
[\[382b.5\]]kyis tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[382b.6\]]pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom 
[\[382b.7\]]sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_
[\[383a\]]
[\[383a.1\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid 
[\[383a.2\]]la bya ba med par/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de 
[\[383a.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byad de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[383a.4\]]pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_
[\[383a.5\]]lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/
[\[383a.6\]]de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[383a.7\]]dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo 
[\[383b\]]
[\[383b.1\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid 
[\[383b.2\]]la bya ba med par/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de 
[\[383b.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs 
[\[383b.4\]]pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong ba nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_
[\[383b.5\]]lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba thog ma dang mtha' ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang mtha' ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/
[\[383b.6\]]de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[383b.7\]]dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_lus kyi 'dus te reg 
[\[384a\]]
[\[384a.1\]]nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams 
[\[384a.2\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_
[\[384a.3\]]stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_
[\[384a.4\]]yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[384a.5\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems 
[\[384a.6\]]su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i 
[\[384a.7\]]tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_yid kyi 'dus te reg 
[\[384b\]]
[\[384b.1\]]pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa 
[\[384b.2\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom 
[\[384b.3\]]sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_
[\[384b.4\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_yid 
[\[384b.5\]]kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[384b.6\]]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 
[\[384b.7\]]kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis 
[\[385a\]]
[\[385a.1\]]tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[385a.2\]]la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med 
[\[385a.3\]]pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen 
[\[385a.4\]]kyis tshor ba dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i tshe/_rnam pa 
[\[385a.5\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[385a.6\]]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /_ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen 
[\[385a.7\]]kyis tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[385b\]]
[\[385b.1\]]tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang 
[\[385b.2\]]dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mi 
[\[385b.3\]]dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[385b.4\]]pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems 
[\[385b.5\]]su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[385b.6\]]gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 
[\[385b.7\]]rkyen kyis tshor ba/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//_//
[\[386a\]]
[\[386a.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po nyi shu bdun pa/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams 
[\[386a.2\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_sa'i khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[386a.3\]]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_sa'i khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_
[\[386a.4\]]de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_sa'i khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong 
[\[386a.5\]]pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_sa'i khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i 
[\[386a.6\]]tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_sa'i khams chen po 
[\[386a.7\]]stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 
[\[386b\]]
[\[386b.1\]]yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_sa'i khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[386b.2\]]tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_sa'i khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom 
[\[386b.3\]]sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_sa'i khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'dus 
[\[386b.4\]]ma byas stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_sa'i khams mtha' las 
[\[386b.5\]]'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa 
[\[386b.6\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_sa'i khams thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang 
[\[386b.7\]]rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_sa'i khams dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[387a\]]
[\[387a.1\]]dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[387a.2\]]par/_sa'i khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa 
[\[387a.3\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_sa'i khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su 
[\[387a.4\]]byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_sa'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi 
[\[387a.5\]]mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_sa'i khams mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[387a.6\]]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[387a.7\]]nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_sa'i khams dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de 
[\[387b\]]
[\[387b.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_sa'i khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_
[\[387b.2\]]stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_sa'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid 
[\[387b.3\]]la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_de shes rab 
[\[387b.4\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_chu'i khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa 
[\[387b.5\]]nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_chu'i khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i 
[\[387b.6\]]tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_chu'i khams phyi nang stong 
[\[387b.7\]]pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan 
[\[388a\]]
[\[388a.1\]]pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_chu'i khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[388a.2\]]tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_chu'i khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems 
[\[388a.3\]]su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_chu'i khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang 
[\[388a.4\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_chu'i khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_
[\[388a.5\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_chu'i khams 
[\[388a.6\]]'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 
[\[388a.7\]]ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_chu'i khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha 
[\[388b\]]
[\[388b.1\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_chu'i khams thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_
[\[388b.2\]]stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_chu'i khams dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i 
[\[388b.3\]]tshul gyis dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_chu'i khams rang bzhin 
[\[388b.4\]]stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 
[\[388b.5\]]ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_chu'i khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi 
[\[388b.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_chu'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_
[\[388b.7\]]stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_chu'i khams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_
[\[389a\]]
[\[389a.1\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan 
[\[389a.2\]]pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_chu'i khams dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[389a.3\]]tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_chu'i khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang 
[\[389a.4\]]rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_chu'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[389a.5\]]gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams 
[\[389a.6\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha 
[\[389a.7\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems 
[\[389b\]]
[\[389b.1\]]su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang 
[\[389b.2\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed 
[\[389b.3\]]de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_
[\[389b.4\]]me'i khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[389b.5\]]nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[389b.6\]]tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis 
[\[389b.7\]]kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul 
[\[390a\]]
[\[390a.1\]]gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_
[\[390a.2\]{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[390a.3\]]tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong 
[\[390a.4\]]pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs 
[\[390a.5\]]pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_me'i khams 
[\[390a.6\]]rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams 
[\[390a.7\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_me'i khams chos thams cad/_stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa 
[\[390b\]]
[\[390b.1\]]nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i 
[\[390b.2\]]tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[390b.3\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[390b.4\]]pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab 
[\[390b.5\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong 
[\[390b.6\]]pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_
[\[390b.7\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[391a\]]
[\[391a.1\]]pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_rlung gi khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom 
[\[391a.2\]]sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_rlung gi khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang 
[\[391a.3\]]dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_rlung gi khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_
[\[391a.4\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_
[\[391a.5\]]rlung gi khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[391a.6\]]mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_rlung gi khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha 
[\[391a.7\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_rlung gi khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_/[{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid 
[\[391b\]]
[\[391b.1\]]kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_rlung gi khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[391b.2\]]gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_rlung gi khams 
[\[391b.3\]]'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[391b.4\]]mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_rlung gi khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed 
[\[391b.5\]]do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_rlung gi khams thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang 
[\[391b.6\]]tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_rlung gi khams dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[391b.7\]]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 
[\[392a\]]
[\[392a.1\]]ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_rlung gi khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab 
[\[392a.2\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_rlung gi khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs 
[\[392a.3\]]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_rlung gi khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_
[\[392a.4\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_
[\[392a.5\]]rlung gi khams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[392a.6\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_rlung gi khams dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang 
[\[392a.7\]]rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul 
[\[392b\]]
[\[392b.1\]]gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_rlung gi khams dngos 
[\[392b.2\]]po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[392b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_nam mkha'i khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis nang 
[\[392b.4\]]stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_nam mkha'i khams phyi stong pa zhes 
[\[392b.5\]]bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 
[\[392b.6\]]yid la bya ba med par/_nam mkha'i khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[392b.7\]]tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[393a\]]
[\[393a.1\]]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_nam mkha'i khams chen po stong pa

[\[397a.1\]]yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams

[\[397b\]]
[\[397b.1\]]tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_ma rig pa 
[\[397b.2\]]dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[397b.3\]]mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_ma rig pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes 
[\[397b.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_ma rig pa dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[397b.5\]]ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[397b.6\]]mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_'du byed nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes 
[\[397b.7\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_'du byed phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_
[\[398a\]]
[\[398a.1\]]stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_'du byed phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_
[\[398a.2\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_'du byed 
[\[398a.3\]]stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 
[\[398a.4\]]ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_'du byed chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam 
[\[398a.5\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_'du byed don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi 
[\[398a.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_'du byed 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang 
[\[398a.7\]]rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_'du byed 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa 
[\[398b\]]
[\[398b.1\]]nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_'du byed mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_

[\[398b.3\]]ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

[\[399a\]]
[\[399a.1\]]nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_'du byed [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong

[\[399b\]]
[\[399b.1\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha

[\[400a\]]
[\[400a.1\]]kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i

[\[401a\]]
[\[401a.1\]{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i

[\[401b\]]
[\[401b.1\]]de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs 
[\[401b.2\]]'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[401b.3\]]dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[401b.4\]]tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_
[\[401b.5\]]stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[401b.6\]]dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid 
[\[401b.7\]]la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang 
[\[402a\]]
[\[402a.1\]]gzugs chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[402a.2\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su 
[\[402a.3\]]byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang 
[\[402a.4\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[402a.5\]]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs ngo bo 
[\[402a.6\]]nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 
[\[402a.7\]]ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//_//
